choices: Flash back to when it all started
Something or someone has found you
11.content:
You take off running down the sidewalk, one of those things chasing you out of the abandoned store, "gotta find a place to hide...gotta find a.." you spot an alleyway with some rubble in it that would make the best escape spot. You make it in the alleyway and pot a hole in some rubble that was deep enough and small enough for you to hide in.

"Never doing that again" you say to yourself as you crawl into the hole, as soon as you make it to the back of your 'cave' you heard footstep or rather the sounds of animal hunting for you outside.

You hug your knees close to your chest, normally you aren't this fearful, but these furry creatures put a change to that, you look around and spot a piece of rebar which you grab to use as a makeshift weapon if 'they' found you.
11.title: Michael, 18, High school drop out

112.content: Is it another human or one of those furry creatures?
112.title: Something or someone has found you

1121.content:
"Hello is anyone there?" you hear a voice, you move toward the hole in the rubble and peek out, standing in front of the alley was a soldier, he was aiming down the alleyway. "I saw someone run down here, hello?" he yells again, suddenly you hear his radio, "all units regroup, we are pulling out, I repeat we are pulling out. Grab any civilians you find and evac ASAP" it spoke.

The solider turned and started to leave, you climb out of your hiding spot, "hey wait!" you yell, he turns around, rifle aimed at you, but as soon as he sees you're human he lowers his gun. "Come on lets go" he says, the two of you take off running, you following him as he leads you back to this supposed 'evac point', soon you both meet up with seven other soldiers and five others.

"Is this all?" the one you assumed was the leader of the group, "yes sergeant" said the solider that found you, "ok helo's going to be--" before he could finish a furry tail whipped out from the nearby building and wrapped around his chest before dragging him away, as he was dragged away he dropped his weapon, letting out a fear filled scream as he was dragged inside.

One of the other soldiers started to freak out, "oh man what do we do now man, if they can just grab us off the streets like that, then what does that mean for us?" he panicked,the soldier that found you walked over to him and smacked him, "screw your head on private, you know there's only one thing we can do......"
1121.title: Human

1122.content:
All of a sudden a large paw reaches into your hiding spot and grabs you by your pant leg, you let out a yelp and swing the piece of metal that was your weapon, hitting right on the knuckle causing the owner of the paw to let out a shout of pain, but not before dragging you out. As you are pulled out you discover that the owner of the paw belonged to a tall and muscular black furred husky, "Well, well, well, what have we here?" he says holding you upside down, behind him you see at least two more furry creatures, a female wolf and some type of fox in a cloak that had multiple tails swishing behind it. "Please let me go" you beg with the husky, he shakes his head, "not gonna happen tiny" he says poking you in the ribs, the wolf comes closer to take a better look at you.

"Not much meat on this one" she says looking you over, you swing at the wolf with your fists, just barely missing her, "lots of fight in this one too" says the fox in a female voice. "Please just let me go Please!" you cry/beg to the group, the wolf and fox start whispering in the husky's ear. Finally after a long talk the three furs look at you, "tell you what kid, you're ours, no arguing that, because you wont do as a meal for the three of us and because I like you a little, one of us will decide your fate instead" says the husky. At hearing this your heart plummets, "now I'm gonna set you down while we decide, don't try to run or its only going to get worse for you" he says, carefully he sets you down and backs up, keeping an eye on you in case you tried to run.

Next thing you know the three of them started doing rock, paper, scissors, "is that really how they're going to decide?!?" you think to yourself in disbelief. After a tense wait of deciding who was going to get you, the winner was..............
1122.title: Furry

choices: Some one or something is in the store
114.content:
You decide the best thing to do is wait until dark and try to move then, besides your little marathon made you tired, so you make yourself as comfortable as possible and drift off to sleep with your rebar weapon in hand. You wake up and see faint moonlight streaming in through the hole in the rubble, you grab the piece of rebar and stick your head out to make sure the coast was clear. You climb out of the rubble upon seeing no one around, slowly you make your way down the street, clutching your weapon tightly, prepared to defend yourself.

Slowly and cautiously you make it to a hunting and camping supply store, your original objective before getting chased down the street by some type of wolf. Cautiously you open the doors and make your way inside, the store was mainly untouched by the chaos outside, you make your way to where the guns so you could have a better weapon, but to your disappointment the only guns there weren't compatible with the ammo that was there, effectively making the guns useless.

Suddenly you hear a clatter outside, so you grab a knife off one of the shelves and make your way to the door. You peek around the corner, but see nothing so you go back and start gathering food and sleeping gear, "might as well stay the night here" you say to yourself. You grab a sleeping bag and locate a concealed spot to sleep, you enjoy a small meal consisting of beef jerky and some trail mix before going to sleep........
114.title: Stay put until dark

1141.content:
Just before you are lulled off to sleep you hear the sound of glass breaking followed by a tiny yelping, you grab your knife and head off towards the source, you come to a corner and peek around. On the ground you see shattered glass and few drips of blood, you turn on one of the flashlights you found and sitting in the middle of the glass was a small Golden Labrador pup with a cut paw that let out a yelp of pain. You pocket you knife and gently pick up the small pup, "come here little guy and let me see" you say to the puppy, who kept whining, the pup's left front paw had a small cut along its pad, but thankfully it was not a serious, "lets get you cleaned up huh?" you say to the pup,stroking its head, calming it down.

You take the pup back to your sleeping area and set to working cleaning and wrapping the wound carefully as not to cause the dog anymore pain, "there you go little one, all set" you say as you finish bandaging the paw. The pup starts licking your face, as if to thank you, to which you scratch him behind the ears, the two of you play around for a while before you decide to try to go back to sleep. You slip back into the sleeping bag and lay the pup on your chest, "night little guy" you say, as the dog yawns and falls asleep, soon you too finally drift off to sleep.
1141.title: Some one or something is in the store

choices: another makeshift bed with more baby animals
11412.content:
You aren't sure how long you were asleep, but you are abruptly awoken to an animal barking at you, you sit up holding the semi-sleeping pup in you hands, standing in front of you was a figure and with what little moonlight that streamed in though the windows, you saw that the figure was a tall, female Labrador like the pup in your hands. She stared at you with a look on her face that said she was not happy, you look at the pup, then at her and then back at the pup, "its not what you think" you say to her, she let out a small growl. either she didn't understand you or didn't care. Slowly you stand up, the Labrador watching you, arms crossed, you look down at the sleeping pup before handing the pup back to its mother.

She carefully take the sleeping pup in her arms, you sit back down on the floor, awaiting for whatever punishment this furry had in store for you. You watch as the canine examines the bandages that you applied to the tiny dog's wounded paw, she gestures for you to stand, so you do, she looked you over carefully before huffing and leaving. You stay standing in place watching the dog leave, she stops and looks back at you before waving for you to follow. You are momentarily confused and afraid by this, unsure if you can trust her, "if she wanted to kill me she could have done it while I slept" you think to yourself, you shrug and follow the dog, she leads you to the back of the store and into a passageway that connected to more stores and buildings before leading you into a former daycare/ nursery. She walks over to a makeshift bedding and sets the sleeping dog down with more sleeping pups, you look around the room and see....................
11412.title: The pup's mother finds you

114123.content:
As you walk into the semi dark room nervously, watching the large furry dog return her sleeping pup to the nest of other puppies, leaving you standing there, shaking nervously, wondering what this dog had planned for you. Soon she stands up and looks back at you and points to a corner next to her, where you only saw a dark spot which you thought was a pile of blankets so you made your way over there. It wasn't until you got closer you saw that the dark spot wasn't a pile of blankets, but was in fact another furry, a large female husky, immediately you jump back and fall in fear at the husky as she sat up and looked at you. As you got ready to bolt you saw the look in her eye, a sort of sadness that made you halt, slowly you got up and moved closer in curiosity, these creatures acting like this was a new thing to you, usually they were nipping at your heels as they chased you, bent on killing you.

As you sat in front of the large husky, she opened up her arms and pulled you closer to her furry body, shivering nervously, not sure what to do you just let her do her thing, after wrapping you up and hugging you from behind, she lays down and pulls you with her, making a sort of murring noise as she seemed happy you didn't leave, this was confirmed with a cold nose to the back of the neck and a lick on your ear, making you giggle lightly. Suddenly you blush and grin embarrassed as you felt her large bust pressed against the back of your shirt as she hugged you harder, resting her muzzle across your head as she sighed happily, slowly you settle in, the husky's soft and warm fur working as a blanket helped to send you back off to sleep.......
114123.title: Another furry creature

choices: Head for the state capitol building...
Stay and help out your fellow officers...
13.content:
It was just like any other day in Lincoln, Nebraska. You were just sitting in your patrol car off the interstate watching vehicles pass you by. It was like this for most of the time you had been in the force. Your father had been a police officer, so of course when you got older that's what you wanted to do. You always wonder if you were destined for greater things in life. However just as you contemplate these thoughts you soon get a call over the radio that all units are needed to the UNL campus immediately. You quickly begin to turn on your squad car and begin heading toward a nearby off ramp into the city. As you get closer to the city center, you start to notice smoke plumes rise from all across town. Getting to an intersection, you watch as 3 S.W.A.T. vans speed past, as the do you pull in behind them and follow as more squad cars follow as well. Upon arriving near the campus you proceed to put you car in park and get out. As you get out you watch as S.W.A.T. teams as well as a few riot units begin dismounting their vans. You now also begin to hear gun fire ringing out at the campus and city. You spot the Sheriff and run up and ask whats the situation.

"Chemical Leak on the campus, we need all units here to help contain the students." he finishes before running forward to brief more officers on the situation. What do the students have to do with a chemical leak? You begin to wonder, looking back to this morning you had seen news reports of similar Chemical leaks across the US, you wonder if they had anything in common. Soon you become detracted by near by gun shots, as you turn to inspect the source, you gun drawn. You spot two officers running out of a near by school building, firing rounds behind them. This all didn't make sense, and even less at what happened next.

You watch as a cougar and wolf come running out and tackling the officers. However these were no normal animals, that looked half animal and half human. They seemed to walk upright and had a figure of a normal human, but now were covered in fur and had many feature of their respective animals. They also had remains of clothing on them as well. You watch as the two officers are mulled in front of you. Hearing more commotion you look around and see more half human animals running out of the campus attack police forces. They ranged in types of animals and sizes. To detracted you soon hear a loud growl near you. Looking behind you see the wolf hybrid from earlier running at you ready to attack. Thinking fast you quickly fire a round into its leg forcing it to the ground in pain. You see more of these things are begin to notice you. Thinking fast you quickly jump back into your squad car and begin pulling away. As you begin to drive away suddenly you end up hitting something or someone. Peering out the side window you see what looks like a deer like human think laying on the ground quickly struggling to get back up and continuing to run away. You don't know what the hell is going on, but you.
13.title: Tim, 21, police officer

choices: Decide to pack up and leave...
Stay at your house and hope to god this blows over...
To late to decide, you hear commotion outside your house!
134.content:
20 Minutes later...

Continued to speed down the interstate, heading for you home. You just couldn't believe what you witnessed, are people turning into animals? No they couldn't be...
As you get to your exit, you spot national guard trucks pass by, heading toward the city, followed by helicopters. What ever was going on it was way above your pay grade. Off the interstate, you drove past homes, where you could see people packing up their cars and trucks. Luckily for you, you still had your old man's home and property out in rural country. You continued to speed towards your destination.

After a few more minutes, you arrived to your property, a small farm house and barn that had been your fathers before he passed. Pulling up the driveway to your house. Thankfully you damaged car had got you home, as it was now smoking under the hood from you hitting that deer "thing" from earlier. Turning of the car you head inside you house and begin to think on what to do. While you think of a plan, you turn on your television to see the emergency alert system blaring, talking about a state of national emergency and all other basic lines it says for you to do. You...
134.title: Head for home...

choices: Go to the barn and take Lynda, your horse...
Leave on foot with your loyal K-9 Max...
Take the partially damaged squad car...
1341.content: Deciding it to be too risky staying in one place at the moment, you get up and run up the stairs and begin to pull out some empty duffel bags and begin to fill them with your personal belongings. You begin to fill one of the bags with your extra clothes and personal care items and tools. You also pack some sheets and other miscellaneous items you could use to help make shelter. After stuffing on bag full, you head for downstairs and into the kitchen, you begin searching through you cabinets for cans of food and water. After a bit of searching you get the last bag set. Putting them at the door, you head to the nearby closest and pull out you trusty hunting rifle and couple rounds for it as well. After grabbing a few small sentimental items you get out to the pouch and figure out your next course of action...
1341.title: Decide to pack up and leave...

choices: You wake up the next morning and decide to keep moving away from this area.
You wake up and find soothing shocking.
13411.content:
Seeing that you car was busted you decide it was your best bet to take your horse. You head for the barn and find Lynda your old horse that your father had given you for your 16th birthday. You thought it best not to leave her behind since you had enjoyed having her, plus she could also help carry the load of your bags. Grabbing a saddle you take her out of the barn and begin rigging her up to go. After a few minutes of prep you manage to load your bags and rifle onto her. Patting her contently you, quickly run over to your squad car and open the trunk and take out the mossenberg shotgun inside and sling it onto your back. Walking back over to Lynda, you swiftly mange to mount onto the saddle and begin to lead you and her away from the farm and off into the wilderness.

... 2 weeks later ...

Well, shit didn't get any better, it got worse, way worse. The entire country was under a national emergency. These anthro animals as people had started to call them, were the result of some kind of virus experimentation done by the US government. Turns out some of the samples they had got mixed up and sent to universities across the nation. There it quickly spreed into the local population, turning people into animal human hybrids, melding their minds as well. Luckily it looked that a good chunk of the population is immune to the virus, though that didn't stop the anthros from reeking havoc and chaos with their new forms. You had heard that some of these anthros still acted like their normal selves, while others embraced their animal nature. Though you were still not willing to try and meet one up close, after what happened on the campus 2 weeks ago.

"CRACK!!", the loud sound of thunder could be head overhead, as you calmly rode your horse through the wooded mountains where you now called home. You had managed to survive of the land well enough, and you still had some rations left as well. Lynda to awhile to get adjusted to her new life here as well. Though with it getting closer to winter, you worried about how hard it was going to be to continue to stay out here. Stopping for a break you get off Lynda and lead her to a nearby stream for water. As you sit down and rest you watch the storm clouds rolling over the distant mountains, lightning occasionally striking the ground. Looking back over to Lynda drinking the water, you can help but notice something looks off about the water. Looking over a bit closer you spot weird coloration in the water. As your about to pull her away you soon hear a massive roar behind you and a chuckle?! Spinning around quickly you spot a massive bear, though this isn't your normal grizzly, no it looked like it was....anthro...

Fuck! you curse under your breath as the bear walks closer laughing . "Well well well, look what we have here, some fresh meat. You look like the perfect size to fill me up for the winter!" It says in a low growly voice. The bear begins to run at you, though you manage to dodge and begin to run over the Lynda, who still had your shotgun strapped on her. Running to pull it out, you startle her as you begin to struggle to pull out your gun. As you almost free the gun a large shadow forms over you, looking behind you and Lynda are quickly tossed by the massive bear. As Lynda falls into the stream. You find yourself up against a nearby tree, and see the bear begin to lick his lips as he moves over towards you growling. As he moves closer towards you, you see the shotgun laying right next to you. As the bear gets ready to begin tearing you apart, you manage to grab and raise the shotgun at him, firing 4 shots in quick succession, you watch the bear anthro topple over. Getting up and rubbing your back you move closer and see the bear anthro is no longer moving or breathing. Sighing in re-leaf over the ordeal you quickly remember about Lynda. Going to the stream, you see her moving out of the water, as you run up and check on her. Everything seems to befine, tho she does look a bit tired from the ordeal as well. Rubbing her mane, you begin to walk back towards your camp nearby.

Upon reaching the camp, the sun begins to sink behind the mountains. Seeing this you begin to start the campfire and settle Lynda down for the night. After eating a can of heated baked beans you decide to turn in for the night, and slump up in a near by alcove in the mountain side...
13411.title: Man in the woods

134112.content: After a long night of tossing and turning you wake up to orange rays of light shimmering over the mountains as the sun begins to rise. Slowly waking up you begin looking around and notice...
134112.title: You wake up and find something shocking.

choices: Decide to head back towards civilization for the winter...
Decide to stick it out in the woods a bit longer...
1341122.content:
You see laying out in the open what you thought a first was your horse, however upon closer inspection you see that Lynda, your horse had changed over night. Instead of you horse laying on the ground was what looked to be a human horse hybrid. It had the figure, hands and feet of a human, but its head shared a similar shape and features of a horses mixed with some of that of a humans facial features. It also looked to have long hair and as well a tail sticking out of it. though the most shocking part of it was it shared the same brown/white fur color and black mane color as did Lynda. Not to mention the figure looked very feminine and was way larger than you were. You mind slowly begins to try and comprehend that you horse now looked like the anthros you had seen before. Think back you realize the color you saw in the water must be why she changed and may also be why there was the massive anthro bear from yesterday! However as you continue to inspect the laying figure in front of you, she begins to slowly move and awaken.

You see her eyes open, noticing they look bigger and more human like. You hear her yawn and neigh at the same time as she begins to lift her form of the ground. You freeze as your horse look up and stare you in the face, not knowing what was going to happen.

"Good morning, master" you hear Lynda say to you in a nonchalant manner, as she gets up see begins to notice her changes and show a look of shock as well. "Wha.. What happened to me?" she says as she begins to inspect her hand and new body. As she inspects you only have one though on your mind. HOLY S*&% MY HORSE IS FUCKING TALKING!!! Internally you a freaking out. However you notice Lynda is now looking at you in worry. "Don't worry master, its me your favorite mare, don't you recognize me?" Still in shock you stand an carefully move closer, keeping eye contact with her.

"Wha..,why, how...." you mumble under your breath.

"I don't know, but please know that I'm not going to hurt you..." She says worryingly towards you.

Well this morning just go a whole lot more interesting.

...15 Minutes Later...

So after a long talk, with.... you horse, you begin to settle down. As far as you and her could figure out the virus or what ever, must have infected the local water supplies and must effect normal animals as well. Standing there, you continue to stare awkwardly at Lynda unsure what to do next. See then decide to stand all the way up and soon you get a good idea of her size. You being close to 6' tall, she towered over you at least at double you height. With her standing you begin to notice that she has the frame of a supermodel, which just make this more awkward. Looking away, she questions you whats wrong. You then explain to her about here being naked and courtesy and what not, which causes her to blush and quickly try and cover her areas with her arms. Trying to make this less awkward you, go to you bag and pull out one of your larger t-shirts and nylon shorts and hand them to her. After a minute of struggling and manipulation she manages to put on the shirt and pants, though the shirts arms are torn to shreds and the bottom of the shirt only goes to right below her chest; and the shorts are stretched to their max, looking more like booty shorts. At least it was better than nothing. We now here you were in the woods, now with you anthro horse, who was twice your size. You..
1341122.title: Lynda has Changed!

choices: Get ambushed by someone or something...
Make it back to your farm...
13411221.content:
Trying to put recent events into the back ground of your mind, you focus on whats important, surviving the coming winter. Seeing that you were beginning to run low on stored food and water, you think it might be best for you to head back towards some form of civilization, plus with the recent change with Lynda, you don't know how she'll handle now out here in the wilderness. Making up your mind, you begin to pack up you items scattered around you. After filling your bag with your belongings, you look up towards Lynda. You see her sitting on the ground, still inspecting her new anthro form and the new assets it come with. With her sitting down she still had a good foot over you in height. Slinging your bag over your back, you walk over towards Lynda, who soon notices you walking towards her.

"Oh, hello master, where are we off to now?" She asks with a bit of excitement in her voice.

"We're heading back towards civilization. Have a bad feeling this coming winter is not going to be good."

"Oh...Well what ever say master!" See responded, though you were beginning to find it awkward of her to call you master, again must be some remnants of her animal mindset of being you horse. Seeing that your ready to go, Lynda proceeds to stand up and begins to look around confused.

"Uuhh, so how are you going to ride on me now? Don't really feel comfortable moving on all fours anymore.."

"Well, guess we'll just walk together then." You say. After saying this you help Lynda get the rest of the supplies. Luckily she was still big enough to easily carry the two duffel bags on her back. You though of lending her one of your guns, though decided against it as her hands were a bit too big to fit the triggers and you also still felt a tiny bit nervous of her now that see was a anthro twice your size. Soon you both begin walking, head down and out of the mountains back towards your farm. As you continue to walk, Lynda looks down at you seeing you burden with carrying your rifle, shotgun, and pistol.

"Master, you sure, you don't want me to carry any of your weapons? I can easily do so for you?" She says looking down at you with concern on her face.

"No, no, its find Lynda, Rather have them on me encase we run into something like yesterday." You say, sowing a bit of exhaustion in your voice,"And by the way, you don't have to keep calling me 'Master' Lynda, just Tim..."

"OK, Mas... Tim, if you say so."

Through out the day you make good progress down the mountain, you start to see basic signs of civilization, roads, signs, power lines. You
13411221.title: Winter is Coming

choices: Fuck it, let her in the house
134112212.content:
After a long trek throughout the day you manage to reach you farm in one piece. You see everything is like how you left it. You squad car still parked in front of your house, and as far as you could see, no obvious sign of break in. As you begin to cross the field, you start to see snow begin to fall from the gray skies above. Even with your jacket and warm clothing you brought with you it still felt freezing. Looking at Lynda, you see that the cold has little effect on her, even with her minimum amount of clothing you gave her.

After making it to the house, you begin to unload all your things into your living room. Checking your lights you confirm that there is no power at all. Needing some warmth you collect some firewood that you had stashed outside your home for your fireplace in your living room. After a few minutes you manage to light the fireplace and warm up a bit, though it still fells a bit chilly. Finishing setting your stuff back up in your home, you walk back outside to find Lynda inspecting the barn. She almost bumps her head on the large door frame going inside. From where you could see and memory, she would have a hard time getting comfortable in the barn. As she walks back out she sees you and quickly walks over to you and bends down to talk to you.

"Is everything alright Tim?" she asks

"Yeah, though its a bit cold, everything is fine, just though to check up with you before I head in and call it a night."

"Oh, yeah i'm fine. Still find this new body so strange, and weird being so bigger than you." You both chuckle at those remarks, before you begin to slowly walk back inside

"We'll good night Lynda, Let me know if you need anything..." you say as you walk in. However before you are halfway through the door, you here the porch creak behind you. Looking back you find Lynda bended down supporting herself with her hands pressed on the porch roof, looking at you with a bit of nervousness.

"Hey... Tim, I saw you were cold and were wondering if maybe...." she says nervously, "I could sleep with you tonight in the house... Since its so cold out I mean."

Well, now your horse turned anthro, was now asking if she could sleep with you, You didn't know if this day could have been anymore weirder. Though she had acted nice towards you all day and still showed loyalty towards you, plus she didn't look half bad....what the hell were you thinking, but, no.....mmm you..
134112212.title: Make it back to your farm...

1341122121.content:
You didn't know what you were doing, but you decide to allow her into your house. You had gained a bit more trust with how shes handled turning into anthro.

"OK...Sure..." You nervously say before you are suddenly grabbed.

"OH THANK YOU MASTER..... Oh Tim, sorry!" Lynda gleefully yells as she picks you up and pulls you into a tight embrace. Well she defiantly still had the muscle of a horse as you began to feel a bit crushed. After a few seconds, she looks down and notices you struggling to breath and quickly sets you back down and begins to apologies profusely towards you. Getting your breath back you begin to lead her inside. The first obstetrical faced is the door, turning around you see Lynda inspect the doorway meant for people half her size. You watch as she bends down to her knees and begins to push and squeeze herself into the house, her amazonian frame not helping her fit smoothly through the door frame. After a minute she manages to get herself all the way through the door.

Inside the house, Lynda is forced to stay crouched, not able to stand at her full height. You awkwardly tell her to make herself at home as she begins to inspect your house and rooms. You show her to the living room with the burning fireplace, as you quickly go into the kitchen to grab a drink. Leaving her be you walk into the kitchen and pull out your canteen and take a sip, looking out the windows at the falling snow. Suddenly you begin to hear commotion and a loud crash sound back in the living room. Quickly putting down the drink you dash to the living to see what the commotion is. Getting there you see Lynda has defiantly tried to make herself at home in your living room. She looked to have inadvertently pushed you furniture around trying to move around. She also looked to have taken a liking to your favorite couch. You watch as she begins to shift her large form onto the couch behind her. Plopping down onto it causes it to strain, right before just completely breaking under her heavy weight. Surprised by the couch collapsing, Lynda jumps a bit, before looking over her shoulder and spotting you.

"He He, Sorry....." she says embarrassingly towards you. Rubbing your head, you begin to walk towards the fireplace. Inspecting it to make sure that its still burning well. After ensuring the fire won't go out anytime tonight, you turn around to look for a resting spot in the room. Looking around you see that its in disarray and not many options for places to sit and rest. You see Lynda is still laying on the remains of your couch facing towards you and the fire.

"Sorry about your furniture, kind of accidentally bumped into some of it. Hope your not to upset..." Lynda says in a worrying tone.

"No, no its fine. You can't help it, plus it was my decision to let you come inside anyways..." you say looking around for a place to sit

"Hey, If you need a place to rest, you could lay right here next to me? So you also have me to keep you warm..if you want, I mean." Lynda says casually. Well looks like you were out of options, as well as a little part of you did want to lay next to Lynda. Walking over you manage to lift some pillows around and sit down in front of Lynda. You kind of were forced on the floor, since all the couch was taken and broken under Lynda's body. Sitting down, you lay back and end of leaning onto Lynda stomach. Her fur did warm you up a bit and felt nice as you began to relax. Looking around you still can't believe that you were doing this, she was still your normal horse a day ago, now a large amazonian horse anthro! It didn't help that she had G size breast and a nice figure to her new form. The more you though about it, the more and more you began to have lewd feeling for Lynda, Though you tried to push them back into the rest of your mind. Looking to your right you see Lynda just calmly breathing and starring into the fireplace as well.

After a while you begin to drift to sleep. Before fully doing so you manage to tell Lynda goodnight. As you do so, you soon find yourself wrapped by one of arms, as she began to hug you slightly.

"Goodnight to you to Tim, and thanks for trusting me..." Lynda says softly as you both slowly begin to drift to sleep in front of the fire as snow gently falls outside.
1341122121.title: Fuck it, let her in the house

choices: You spot a house in the distance
14.content:
You walk through the wheat field slowly, boonie hat pulled low on your brow to shade your eyes from the blazing sun, scanning for any signs of movement, human or---. You shudder at that last thought, "its hard to believe its been three months, feels like days" you think to yourself. You think back to three months ago, when this all started, you were a buck sergeant in the Army, only one year out of Ranger school. You had been stationed at a Nation Guard base out in Illinois to help train some of the guardsmen, one day you got a call to help evacuate part Chicago, they said it was a chemical spill, but there weren't any type of chemical plants in that part of the city, but they still made you wear protective gear anyways.

After your unit got set up, evacuation went smoothly....at least for the first six hours, then panic suddenly erupted and thats when you saw the first ones. The first creature you saw had tackled someone and was about to attack them if two guardsmen hadn't dropped it first. At first glance you thought the creature was just some lion that had escaped from the zoo during all this confusion, but you noticed this animal had distinctive human features like, hands, and wore some articles of clothing, but was covered from head to toe in fur.

That's when you saw them all, hidden in the dark were multiple sets of glowing eyes, staring at you and then at their fallen comrade, then back at you. Suddenly a noise pulls your attention out of your thoughts.
14.title: Christopher, 28, Army Ranger

141.content:
The sound of an approaching helicopter grabbed your attention, you look around and pull out a pair of binoculars that you acquired over your travels. After scanning the skies you finally spot a UH-60 BlackHawk flying in your general direction, you quickly pull out a green smoke grenade and toss it, hoping to signal the helicopter. It wasn't long before you had a large plume of green smoke billowing from the grenade in front of you.

"Come on" you whisper to yourself, the BlackHawk make a turn towards you, you breath a sigh of relief. It wasn't long before the BlackHawk was close enough you no longer needed the binoculars to see it.
141.title: Helicopter

choices: To help out a research facility
1411.content:
It wasn't long before the BlackHawk was beginning to land, you could see one of the door gunners keeping his gun pointed not quite at you. As soon as the wheels touched the ground the side door slid open and three armed soldiers hopped out and ran over to you, you unsling your rifle and hold it away from your body barrel pointed at the ground. "check him" the lead one commands, the soldier to his left walks forward with something in his hands, "look into the lens please" he says pointing to the box like object in his hands. You comply and look into what you assumed was a scanner, after a few seconds a green light lit up, "he's clean" said the soldier, "alright lets get outta here" says the leader of the group.

You climb into the BlackHawk with them and moments later you were airborne, "sorry about that, we have to do that ever since we found out that some of these creatures have made themselves look like humans" says the leader. "And don't forget the one that had actually possessed that one civilian" said one of the other soldiers from beside you. "So is it too late for introductions?" you ask, "Petty officer Second class Robert Miller, Navy Seal" said the soldier to your right, "Staff Sergeant Joshua Niles, Air force PJ (Pararescue)" said the soldier that scanned your eye earlier. You look at the last man in the group, " Gunnery Sergeant Aaron Thompson, USMC Force Recon" he says, " Staff Sergeant Christopher Grimm, Army Rangers" you say holding out your hand for shaking, "so if you don't mind me asking, where are we going?" you ask......
1411.title: It lands(Humans)

14112.content:
Joshua looks at you, "we received a call for help from one of your testing facilities, their last transmission we received stated that they had captured one of those animal creatures and were 'researching' it" he says, making air quotes on the word research. "That was three days ago" spoke up Robert, you look over at Aaron, but he said nothing and continued to look out the side door window, "so what's his story?" you ask Joshua quietly, pointing to the silent Marine. "He lost most of his unit during the initial collapse of society, half to rioting civilians and the other half to these creatures, only him and four others are still around." he said. You nod, "I know that feeling, last of my company" you say pointing a thumb at your chest, "just me and this helicopter crew" says Joshua. "I got lucky, most of my company was still on ships through the majority of the chaos" said Robert.

After a two hour ride in complete silence the BlackHawk comes into view of the research facility, "Ok here's the plan, helo's gonna drop us off and return home until we call it back, get in and find out what happened, expect the worse, grab anything that looks important, neutralize anything hostile" said Aaron as the helicopter came into land. He pulled the side door open and jumped out, rifle up and at the ready, Robert hopped out next, followed by you and then Joshua, you had to squint to keep the rotor-blown dust out of your eyes. The four of you take off running toward the nearest concrete structure, as you reach the side of the building, the BlackHawk had already became airborne and was flying away.

As you reach for the door handle..........
14112.title: To help out a research facility

141121.content:
As your gloved hand wrapped around the door handle you hear someone shouting, "HEY YOU DON'T WANT TO GO IN THERE!!!!", you look around and spot two males flailing their arms, trying to get your attention. The four of you back away from the door and make your way toward the two unknown figures, as you got closer you saw they were wearing clothing that was associated with scientists, one had a white lab coat and the other wore a slightly torn dress shirt and khakis. Both male looked like they haven't gotten any sleep and have been living in their clothing for a while, "and why don't we want to go in there?" Aaron asks while you, Joshua, and Robert scan the surrounding area for more surprises, "because 'it' lives in there" said the male with the lab coat. The four of you look at each other with the same expression of confusion, "ok want to be a little more specific on what 'it' is?" Robert asks. The other male shakes his head, "not here and it might be better if we show you" he says, the four of you follow the two males into the building they emerged from, as soon as the last person was in, a group of people started to barricade the door.

You take the rear of the group, as you walk down the hallway you start nosing around, you peek in one of the doors, sitting on the floor was a younger male, dressed like the others, but he had the look of fear in his eyes, he was hugging his knees and rocking back and forth slightly, mumbling. He seemed to notice you and looked right at you, "don't leave me alone" he said in a scary neutral tone. You felt a tingle of fear creep down your spine, "Gunny!" you yell down the hall followed by sounds of people running toward you, you take your eyes off the male and see Aaron, Joshua and Robert running towards you followed by the two scientists, you point into the room, he looks in opens the door more, to your surprise you spot at least ten more people, all acting the same way.

Aaron looks back at the scientist with the lab coast, "what's wrong with them?" he asks, "It did this" he says, "ok we'll do this the hard way" Aaron says to himself as he walks toward the scientist, he grabs him by his coat and slams him into the wall. "No more 'it' did this, 'it' did that, tell me what happened here NOW!" he orders.........



After hours of talking the room finally goes quiet, "ok so let me just recap, you guys captured a one of these creatures and brought it here to study" says Robert, the scientist in the lab coat named Richard, nodded. "But you underestimated its...um...um mind powers" you struggle to remember what Richard said, "psychic abilities" Richard corrected, "right, anyway it managed to escape, but you confined it in the building that we almost entered" you continue. Again, Richard nodded, you sigh and lean back in your seat, rereading the file that Richard gave each of you, it was only a partial file as the rest of the research was lock next door with the creature.

In the folder was a transcript version of the video logs on the day the anthro creature escaped its confinement,

(Star of Transcript)

Video log number 21:

Subject has shown a great fear of being returned into solitary confinement, on that note, subject's food and water intake take a dramatic turn when isolated or threatened with isolation. Subject's anatomy consists of---wait a minute....WE HAVE A CONTAINMENT BREACH, I REPEAT WE HAVE A-----------
(End of Transcript)

You set the file back on the table and rub your eyes, "not much to go on" you say to yourself. "Why don't you go get some sleep" says Joshua, looking up from his folder, you nod and leave the room to the small single make-shift bedroom for some sleep.......
141121.title: Some one signals you

1411212.content:
You are suddenly awoke from your slumber for no apparent reason, you look at your watch and see it was close to midnight. Suddenly you hear whispering on the other side of your door, "hello?" you say, there was no response, but the whispering continued. You grab your M9 and open the door, to your surprise there was no one there, you look up and down the hallway, still no one. You grab a flashlight and walk down the hallway with the flashlight out in front of you and your pistol down at your side. You peek into Aaron's room and see he was missing, you continue onto Joshua's room and he too was missing, same with Robert.

As you reached an intersection in the hallway you hear the whispering again and it sounded like the person whispering was just around the corner. In one quick motion your turn the corner, gun and flashlight raised, but you get blinded by a flashlight before you could the turn, "DROP IT!" ordered an authoritative voice. Your eyes adjusted to the light and you could make out Joshua standing there with a flashlight and his sidearm pointed at you. As soon as he saw it was you he quickly lowered his gun, "Jeez dude, I almost shot you" he says, "what are you doing out here?" you ask. "I heard whispering outside my door" he says, "same" you say, just then you hear the sound of giggling coming from the other end of the hallway.

You and Joshua aim down the hallway, "the hell was that?" says Joshua in a confused and afraid voice, the two of you slowly make your way down the hallway. You both come to another corner in the hallway, as you round the corner you see Aaron and Robert standing by a double set of doors, looking out towards the building where the trapped creature was, "you guys ok?" you ask cautiously, holding your handgun tightly. Aaron looks over his shoulder and spots you and Joshua with your sidearms drawn, "yeah we're fine, are you?" he asks cautiously, "yeah its just that......we heard--" "Voices?" Robert interrupted you. "Yeah" Joshua says, the four of you go over what has happened so far and one thing is clear, something was trying to draw you towards the second building..........
1411212.title: Something wakes you

choices: The creature is in the room
14112121.content:
"We need to get over there and check it out" Aaron says, "what about that thing?" Joshua asks, Aaron lets out a small sigh, "this will be a volunteer Recon, I won't hold it against you if you want to stay, but I am going" he says. "Well then I'm going" you say stepping forward, "me too" says Robert, looking away from the door, the three of you look at Joshua, "aw alright I guess I better go too" he says. The four of you return to your rooms and grab your weapons and gear before opening the double doors and running across the strip of macadam between the two buildings.

"Ok lets stick together, we stand a better chance as a group if we run into that creature" says Aaron. The four of you spread out a good distance from each other, but not too far apart, with your helmet and rifle flashlights sweeping around the dark hallway. Just then you hear giggling coming from the end of the hallway, all four of you stopped and aimed down the hallway, but there was nothing.

You make it to the last room at the end of the hallway, you put your ear near the door and you could make out light giggles. Aaron signals silently for everyone to stack up on the door and starts counting down from five, at zero he kicks in the door and everyone swarms in rifles raised......
14112121.title: Go investigate

141121212.content:
As you enter the room the first thing you notice are the large vents coming out of the ceiling, "what is this room?" you think to yourself. Suddenly a reinforced steel door slams shut behind you, sealing you in the room. Joshua and Aaron start pounding on the door in an poor attempt to get it open. Robert stops them, "listen" he says, the four of you stop and shine your helmet lamps around the room, just then you hear the sound of air coming out of the vents. You look at the door and then at the vents, thats when it dawns on you what this room is for, "we need to get this door open now" you shout.

Aaron aims at where the door's lock would be and fires off several rounds into the door, you, Joshua, and Robert grab the door and start pulling, but it didn't budge. "Again" you shout, as all four of you pull on the door again, you start to feel light headed, just then you feel the door shift a little. As you try again, Robert collapses, his breathing was heavy like he had just climbed twenty flights of stairs, Aaron ran over to check on him while you and Joshua kept at the door, you manage to get it to move at least three inches before you noticed Aaron had collapsed as well.

Joshua stumbles away from the door and starts to collapse, suddenly you started to feel the effects of whatever was being pumped into the room, your vision started to distort and you found it increasingly difficult to keep your balance. You look over and see Joshua was already passed out, you slump up against a wall and unholster your sidearm, determined to try and get whoever was responsible for this, but unfortunately for you, you pass out long before someone enters the room and relieves the four of you of your gear.

When you come to, you find yourself alone in a large cell with a massive head ache, "hey is someone there?" you hear a familiar voice call out, "Robert?" you shout. "Where am I?" you hear another voice call out, "Joshua" Robert asks, "yeah where are we and why does my head hurt?" Joshua calls out. "Hang on, where's Aaron?" you ask "I don't kno-" before Robert could finish the sound of a door opening stopped him mid-sentence.

To your surprise in walked...........
141121212.title: Its a trap

1411212121.content:
To your complete surprise in walked Richard, the scientist with the lab coat, behind him walked two soldiers with heavy duty armor, "oh thank god, quick you gotta get us outta here" said Robert, but Richard didn't move. Richard grunted to himself and scribbled something on a clipboard in his hands, "Richard what are you waiting for, get us outta here" you say, he chuckled, "don't you get it do you? I was the one that had you captured" he said. "What!?" you say in confusion, "you won't believe how hard it is to get good test subjects around here" he says looking back at his clipboard

"You son of a bitch, we came to help you, not become a science experiment" yells Joshua, "oh you are helping me, my research will help bring about the end of these creatures, but you know in the end there will be sacrifices" Richard says. He turn to one of the soldiers, "this one" he says pointing to you, "when I get outta here I'm gonna---" you are cut short by one of the armored soldiers, he raises a pistol looking device and shoots you with it, plunging your world into darkness.

When you come to you find yourself strapped to some type of examination table in a room that was only illuminated by a single, over head light. "So human, you are finally wake" says a female voice, "who's there?" you say with panic in your voice, wrestling with the restraints. "Calm yourself human, before you do yourself harm" said the mysterious voice, just then you felt something brush your left cheek, but when you turned to look, all you saw was darkness, "who or what are you?" you say. "Hmm I guess an introduction is needed" said the voice, at the foot of the table you could make out a figure standing just outside the light. What caught your eye the most about the figure was the eyes, they glowed in the dark like they had their own source of light behind them, the figure stepped forward into the light and for the second time today you were left speechless by what you saw............
1411212121.title: A human

14112121213.content:
Standing just inside the ring of light was one of those anthro creatures, but this one seemed to be a mix of species, it looked like a cross of a fox and a snow leopard, the other strange thing about this creature were the five long, bushy tail flowing behind her. "You don't seem that afraid of me or is it that you have replaced your fear with the undying urge to beat the crap out of me?" she says, walking over to you, stroking your face with one of her clawed hands. "Trust me..um...ma'am I'm more scared that I look it right now, I'm just that good at hiding my fear from others" you tell her, "Ah, but the real question I was asking is, if I free you, are you going to try to kill me?" she asks.

You look at this strange hybrid and think about it for a minute, but then you remember what you read in the file Richard had given you, this anthro had psychic abilities, so she would probably know what you were thinking before you could act. "That's right I would know what you would be thinking before you could do me any harm" she says with a grin, you look at her wide-eyed, "but given the fact that you are thinking this through is a good enough answer for me" she says. With a wave of her paws your restraints release you from the table, "if you don't mind me asking, but why are you freeing me?" you ask, "let me explain something to you." said the fox hybrid.

"You are in my living cell so which probably means you were brought here to be my dinner," she says, your face becomes as white as a sheet after hearing this. "Its ok, I'm not going to make a meal out of you" she says, you calm down a little, "any ways, I realized something, you and I want the same things, freedom and revenge, so i have a plan to get both those things, and I'm going to need your help and trust" she says. "Hang on, before we go any further I want to make sure we really do want the same thing, who is it you want revenge on?" you ask, "that worm, Richard, he's tortured me for months, Isolation, solitary, food and water deprivation, and.....many other things I rather not talk about" she says looking away from you. "Ok, but if I'm going to be trusting you, can I at least get your name?" you ask, the fox looks at you and smiles, "my name is Alese, but I like Allie better" she says.

"Ok Alese- I mean Allie, what now" you ask, Allie gets off the table and walks over to the door, with a wave of her paw, the door opens and an alarm sounds, she walks back over to you and sets her hands on your shoulders, "now, you trust me" she says before pulling you into a tight hug. Suddenly you begin to feel different, you look and see...........
14112121213.title: A hybrid

141121212131.content:
Allie pulls you into a deep hug, her snow leopard pattern fur rubbing up against you, her five long, puffy tails wrapping themselves around your chest and waist. "This is her plan?" you think to yourself, listening to the alarm, suddenly you feel a coldness seeping through your clothes, like someone was pressing their cold hand on your bare skin. As the two of you stood there you feel the coldness seeping deeper into your body, reaching every fiber of your being, it almost felt as if the cold was chilling your very soul. You look down at Allie and to your shock you see she was sinking into you! You try to free yourself, but it was no use, she was already too far in, she raised her head and gave you a small kiss on the cheek, "trust me" she whispered into your ear before the last of her disappeared into you. You stagger to the table and hold onto it for support while you replay what just happened in your head, you suddenly felt very nauseous, you collapse to one knee, still grabbing the table. You drop into a sitting position, facing the now broken door, You still feel the coldness in your body, but not as intense as before, soon your vision starts distort and fade, just before you black out you hear the sound of boots running down the hall toward you.........

You are awoke to someone lightly, but firmly slapping your cheek, "hey Sergeant you awake?" came a familiar voice, as you vision starts to focus you could make out the face of Aaron leaning over you. "Thompson?" you say weakly, "yeah, its me, you good?" he asked, "if you're going to give me a good slapping, at least buy me dinner first" you joke, he breaks out in a grin, "fucking smart ass" he says helping you sit up. You look around and find yourself in a cell, but a much larger one than before, you look around and see that Joshua and Robert were also in the cell too. "What happened?" asked Joshua, "um, I remember waking up in a dark room, strapped to a table and I remember meeting the creature, oh what was her name....oh yes, Alese---", you are interupted by Aaron, "wait you met this creature AND you're still alive?" he asks, you nod. "She wants the same thing we want, revenge on Richard and to be freed, thats it" you tell him, "how can we trust her?" said Robert in a doubtful voice," how do we know she won't just eat us after?" he adds.

"Because she had plenty chance to eat me, but she didn't, and how do we know she won't try after she's free, i don't know" you tell him. "Ok....did she have a plan on how to get out of here?" Joshua asks, "she told me to trust her, that's all I remember" you tell him, he throws his hands up in defeat, "that's just great" he says more directed to himself than you. "Did I miss anything while I was out?" you ask, "yeah, when the guard dragged you back here, they were talking about a containment breach, think its your friend?" Robert asks, you shrug before getting to your feet and walking over to a set of cell bars............
141121212131.title: Allie merging with you

choices: You get that cold feeling again
1411212121312.content:
You walk over to one of the cell's walls and lean against the metal bars, you see no guards, but there was one camera looking at you, you sigh and stuff your hands in your pockets, suddenly you felt something in your left pocket. This surprised you because when you were captured, they took everything from you, save for your clothes, as secretive as possible you pull the item out of your pocket and take a quick peek at it. To your complete surprise you pull out a key and not just any key, it was the key to the cell that you were imprisoned in, you quickly put it back and make your way over to Aaron. "What would you say if I told you I have a way outta here?" you whisper, he raises an eyebrow at you, slowly you pull the key out and secretively show it to him.

He put on his best poker face and used his hands to cover his mouth, "is that from our new found ally?" he asked, "I think so" you say putting the key away. He sighs again, "we still have that camera to deal with" he adds, you look at the camera and sigh, he was right, the camera pointed right at the cell door, which meant the minute you open that door, armed guards would be all over you. You lean against the wall and stare at the camera, suddenly you hear a familiar voice "trust me", you look around the cell, but saw no one else besides the four of you, just then you see the camera explode, Joshua jumps up from his seat, "what the?" he starts. you move towards the door, key in hand and unlock the door and push it open just as you hear the first guard running down the hallway, Aaron runs over just as the soldier appeared, Aaron slugged him so hard, he was out before he hit the floor, you run over and take the fallen guard's sidearm, "alright I'm a little lost on what just happened, but lets move past that, what now?" Robert asks............
1411212121312.title: "What's in my pocket?"

choices: You get that cold feeling again
14112121213121.content:
"I think its best if we locate the armory" said Aaron, toting the guard's rifle, the three of you nod in agreement, Joshua and you secure the unconscious guard in the jail cell, taking the key with you. The four of you move stealthily down the corridor, surprisingly no other guards or cameras were in sight, "where is everyone?" you ask, Aaron shakes his head. You come to a split in the hall way, both ways look identical, "um I think we should go this way" Aaron says pointing right, "Go left" said the voice from earlier, you look around you, but spot no one else, "hey guys, call it a gut feeling, but I think we should go left" you say. Aaron looks at you for a few seconds before nodding, after walking for a little you round the corner and spot a door with the word Armory stenciled on it.

You open the door and peek in, no guard, "its odd how there are no guards patrolling the hallways or guarding the armory" says Joshua. You open the door and seal it behind you, what you saw left you speechless, inside the armory were rows of belt fed weapons and heavy duty ballistic body armor lining the walls, one section of weapons caught your attention, you make your way over to a row of caged weapons. Inside the cage were rows of belt fed M240 Bravo medium machine guns, but the barrels seemed different, but you could put your finger on it, you open up the cage and grab one of the 240's, it seemed lighter than you remember, on a nearby desk you spot a piece of paper with the schematics of the gun on it. "Hey Josh come take a look at this and see if you can tell me what this means" you say holding up the paper, he runs over and take the paper from you, after reading it his face lights up in surprise, "they figured out how to combine a new, undiscovered alloy with the metal in the gun's barrel" he says excitedly.

"Ok say that again, but a lot slower and dumber fro the rest of us who missed out on chemistry and all that" says Aaron, "they figured out how to make the m240 fire continuous without overheating. "So what you're saying is that I can fire for as long as i want and the barrel will still be ice cool?" you ask, "yeah pretty much" says Josh. "Ok ok so we got guns now, what next?' asks Robert, "we find Richard" says Aaron, "how, we don't even know where he is" you say, suddenly.........
14112121213121.title: Try to locate the armory

choices: You arrive at his office, unopposed
141121212131213.content:
All of a sudden, you start to feel cold, it starts in your hands and slowly works its way inward, "do you guys feel cold?" you ask as you start to shiver, "no dude, its like 80 degrees in here" says Robert. "Its just that I got cold all of a sudden" you say, rubbing your hands together, "are you feeling ok?" Aaron asks, "I don't kno--" you are suddenly interrupted by a paw jumping out from your chest, all four of you go wide eyed, staring at the leopard patterned paw and arm poking out of your chest, "WHAT THE FU-----" you start, but are interrupted by Alese walking out of you, like you were just a doorway and not a human being. She stands in the center of your little group and turn to face you, just then Aaron snapped out of his shock and raised his captured rifle at her.

She turn and raises her paws like she was surrendering, "hang on I'm not going to hurt you" she says, "why the hell should I believe you?" he orders. "Because I have the same goals right now, revenge and freedom, just like I told your friend here" she says pointing to you, "whats stopping me from just shooting you anyways?" he asks, "well you can if you want, but then you'll never find Richard" she says. You could tell by the look on Aaron's face that he was weighting the pros and cons of either letting Alese help or not, finally Aaron lowers his gun, "fine, but don't even think about trying to screw us over" he says, she shakes her head, "wouldn't dream of it" she says, lowering her paws. The whole time the conversation was going on you saw Robert and Joshua looking at Alese and then at you and then back at her, trying to figure out what had just happened.

"Ok how do we get Richard?" you finally ask after the last of the coldness left you, "All his 'soldiers' are out looking for me in another part of the building, so for the most part they shouldn't be a problem." says Alese "So what, we're just going to walk right in there?" asks Joshua, "pretty simple right?" she says, "how do you know where to go?" you ask, she turns and looks at you, "I can read minds remember?" she says to you with a smile. "Alright lets get moving, we might not have long before they realize we're not where we're supposed to be" says Aaron, The four of you grab body armor, ammo and an M240B each before setting out for Richard's office.......
141121212131213.title: You get that cold feeling again

choices: Some soldier heard a commotion and came to investigate
1411212121312132.content:
After a tense fifteen minutes of walking down a maze of corridors with Allie showing the way, you finally reach a door, "he's in here, but there's someone else too" she says, the four of you look at each other, "I've got an idea, roll with it" says Joshua. Joshua knocks on the door, "it better be important" said an older gruff voice, "we have a possible lead on the escaped creature" says Joshua, you could hear the sound of the door unlocking, as soon as the door started to open the four of you shoved your way in, knocking over the lone guard that answered the door. Sitting behind a desk was Richard, as soon as he saw you he took off toward what looked like an alarm on the nearby wall, Allie extended a paw and suddenly Richard was sent flying back in his chair by an invisible hand.

"Sit down Richard, we need to have a little chat" you say, Robert had his weapon drawn on the fallen guard while the rest of you trained on Richard. "You really screwed the pooch now" says Allie, suddenly Richard pulls a gun out from his desk and points at Allie, you tighten your grip on your gun, "you don't understand my research do you?!" he says. "In the eight months I've been studying--" "wait EIGHT months!" you interrupt, "you knew about creatures like her months before they attacked?!" you add. "Thats besides the point, my research has led to many great discoveries, those weapons are prime examples" he says, "whats stopping us from turning you into swiss cheese right now?" said Aaron, "well for starters, you need my research, everything is right in here" he says pointing to his head.

Allie shakes her head, "he's lying, all his work in stored on an external drive on that shelf" says Allie, pointing to the shelf along the wall. Richard's face changed to fear, "tell me dear, why are you helping them, you know they're just going to turn you in when this is all over and you will be back in a cell" he says to Allie. "No, they wouldn't do that, I know it" she says, Richards face changed, as if he finally solved some puzzle, "which one is he, is it this one?" he asks, pointing his gun at Aaron. Aaron tightened his girp on the trigger, "or this one?" he asks, pointing at Joshua, "or maybe this one?" Richard says as he point the gun at you, Allie visibly flinched, which Richard noticed, "ah so its this one" he says with a grin.

"Why do you care?" Allie says, "well its the final part of my project" he says, "what project?" Aaron asks, "In case you haven't noticed Sergeant, humanity is nearing extinction, but the completion of this project will put a end to that" he says, "you know what, I'm getting sick of hearing your voice, Allie, help me out here" you say, suddenly Richards face is smashed into his desk by an invisible hand, knocking him out. You and Aaron move over to him and restrain him, "alright lets call in the calvary and get out of here" says Aaron..................
1411212121312132.title: You arrive at his office, unopposed

choices: The next morning, you've started to change
14112121213121321.content:
Joshua locates a radio and calls in for the BlackHawk to return and for some reinforcements to be sent. After an hour you manage to secure any research that would be valuable and using Allie, you order the surrender of Richard's private army, you took this lull in time to speak to Allie. "I've been meaning to ask, what did Richard mean by 'is it this one' and 'is it that one' ?" you ask, Allie's fur flutters, "um..well, remember what happened back in my cell with the whole merging thing, well we're kind of stuck with each other" she says. You look at her confused, "I don't get it," you say, she sighs, "well, when we became..you know..'one', part of my soul and part of your soul switched, so I have part of your soul in me and you have part of mine" she says.

You take a step back, even more confused, "what does that mean in terms of how my health will be affected?" you ask, "it mean if one of us dies, then so does the other.....listen I'm sorry for not telling you earlier" she says lowering her head, "yeah that kind of would have been nice to know before hand" you say, "I'm sorry there wasn't enough time to explain" she says, you notice tears starting to form in her eyes, "I asked you to trust me and you did, and if your willing to trust me again I can reverse this, make everything go back to the way it was and you never have to deal with me again" she says. You sigh as you look at her, she stared at you with tear soaked, puppy eyes, "ok I trust you, but no more leaving out the tiny details again ok?" you say, setting you hands on her shoulders, she nods and surprises you with one of her hugs.

The two of you head outside where everyone else was waiting for the choppers to arrive, "hey sarge, I have to take off on you" you say to Aaron. He looks at you confused, you point your thumb at Allie, "some unfinished business" you say, "does this have to do with the whole 'possession thing' that happened in the armory?" he asks, you nod. Joshua hears you and walks over, "why don't you stay with us, I'm sure our people could help you" he suggests, "yeah and once they found out a human and an anthro shared the same body or whatever, then I would be the one in the cell, being experimented on, and we'd be back where we started" you tell him. "Ok then I guess we'll be seeing you around then huh?" says Aaron, "I guess so" you say, shaking his hand, "here, this is the best way to get in contact with me if you need to" he says, handing you a piece of paper with map coordinates and radio frequency numbers on it. He turns to Allie, "you know, you not that bad I guess" he says, holding out his hand, she smiles and shakes his hand.

The two of you say your goodbyes and leave before the BlackHawks arrived, "so where exactly are we going?" you ask, "a friend of mine, he knows how to reverse this" she says. The two of you walk in complete silence for a little more that three hours before you decide to break the ice again.

"Question" you say, "since we technically share souls, does that make us soul mates?" you ask, Allie looked at you and though about if for a second, "Umm...yeah I guess it does, doesn't it" she says with a small grin. Soon the two of you find an abandon house and decide it was best to stop for the night as it was starting to get dark out. As you start setting up a bed for the two of you to sleep in, you notice Allie had disappeared and after a quick search you found her on the roof, staring at the stars, you carefully climb out and sit next to her, "I'm sorry, its just that I've been locked away so long I sort of forgot how beautiful this is" she says.

The two of you stay out of the roof for a little over four hours at which point you notice Allie had fallen asleep, leaning on you, you run your hand up and down her back, causing her tails to wrap around you. Very carefully you carry her off the roof and back into the bedroom, as soon as you laid down, she snuggled up to you, rubbing her soft fur over your face and body, pretty soon you start to drift off......................
14112121213121321.title: Soul mates

141121212131213213.content:
That night you wake up to go to the bathroom, after you relieve yourself you notice that Allie wasn't in the bed, a quick search and you find her back on the roof, staring at the night sky again. You contemplate going out and sitting next to her, as if she knew you you were there, she asked you a question, "do you like me?" she asks, not looking at you. At first you are dumbfounded that she knew you were there, but then you remembered she could read minds and knew you were awake, you walk out and sit next to her, "what do you mean?" you ask. "Well just that, do you like me?" she says looking at you, "well you're very beautiful and you tails are sort of cute" you say, truth be told, she was by far the hottest girl you have ever met, you liked everything about her, from her body to her soft fur, coming from the guy who didn't do very well with girls in highschool, which was one of the reasons for you enlisting.

Suddenly you see Allie break out in a grin, thats when you realized she was reading you mind, "thats not fair " you say, pointing at her, she laughed, "so me being non-human dosen't bother you?" she asks, "no not really, I mean if our species had met under different circumstances then I would gladly tried to ask you out, and probably messed up" you say. Even in the dark you could tell Allie was blushing under her fur, "you're sweet and honest and if you had asked me out I would say yes because........I know this might sound a little cliché, but you're loyal, brave, you're unfaltering, strong and pure" she says, looking into your eyes. "maybe this whole 'soul sharing' thing isn't that bad is it?" you say, "no, in my culture it is only supposed to happen when someone like me had found....well....." she stops and looks away, obviously nervous or afraid, " has found......?" you ask, trying to get her to continue, she looks back at you, her eyes tearing up a little, "well..the one" she says with a small smile.

You look at her in shock, "c-could this be a mistake...I mean we just met and we aren't even the same species" you ask, "I thought the same, but this 'selection process' if you will, has never been wrong...ever" she says, "there's a first for everything" you think to yourself, surprisingly, Allie didn't say anything about your thought. "That's why I asked if you liked me" she says, "I do like you " you finally say, "would you be willing to accept me?" she asks a little cautiously.........................
141121212131213213.title: That night

1411212121312132131.content:
You look at Allie, "yes I will accept you" you say, knowing full well the consequences and new responsibilities of doing this, Allie's face lit up, she reached over and practically tackled you in a hug. She was saying something, but she was crying too much that you couldn't make out what she was saying, but you got the gist of it. She looked back at you with tear soaked eyes, "you really mean it?" she says, you reach up and wipe away her tears, "of course I do" you say, she leans in and gives you the sweetest kiss of your life, time seemed to grind to a halt, minutes seemed to turned to hours and before you knew it you lost track of time.

Finally she breaks the kiss and rest her head aganst your chest, her tails wrapping lovingly around you, "I guess we don't need to go see my friend do we" she says, "we can still visit him if you want, you know give him the good news" you say, "later, I'm more concerned as to where we will live that we won't be..uh distracted" she says. "Well there is my uncles cabin, he left it to me when he passed, its secluded and no one else besides me and my brother knows where it is" you say, Allie looks up at you, "I think thats a great idea, but what about your brother?" she asks, you sigh, "ever since this whole thing started, I've been trying to find him, you know to make sure he's ok and all, but I don't know where he is" you say in a sad voice.

Allie nudges you chin with her muzzle, "I can help you find him, do you have a picture of him?" she asks, you nod and get up to retrieve his photo out of your vest where you always kept it. You return with the photo and a blanket as you were starting to get cold, you drape the blanket over the two of you and hand the photo to Allie, she stares at it intensely, as if she was trying to memorize every detail, finally after staring at the photo for what seemed like hours, she hands it back to you, "well?" you ask. "Talk about coincidences, he's with my friend that we were going to see" she says, you chuckle, "you're kidding?" you say with smile, "no he really is, he's safe and sound, my friend and his family are taking care of him" she says, you mentally breath a sigh of relief that your brother was safe.

The two of you spend a couple more minutes on the roof before returning to bed, just as you got into bed Allie spoke up, "love?" she asked, "I'm never going to get used to that" you think to yourself, "yes?" you say. "Since we are now mates and everything I was wondering if you wanted to ...you know...seal the deal?" she asked. You look at her a little surprised, "is she asking........? well I guess it was going to happen eventually" you think to yourself...............
1411212121312132131.title: "I now pronounce you man and wife....er fox"

14112121213121321311.content:
You look at Allie and smile at her, without saying anything you lean in, she doesn't waste anytime. She presses her lips up against yours, her canine tongue dominating the inside of your mouth, using her tails and hands, she starts removing your clothing, after a good fifteen minute make out session she straddles your nude body, "are you ready for me?" she asks in a seductive voice. She directs your hands to her hip and impales herself, at first you are hit with a wave of pleasure that almost sent you over the edge, it has been a long time since you had sex with anyone and doing it someone like Allie was much more arousing and exciting. For what felt like hours the two of you continue for most of the night, moaning and panting, switching positions, and finally as if planned, the two of you climax at the same time.

As you both lay back down, panting, the sun started to rise over the horizon, "I could use a few more minutes of sleep, but I guess its time to get up" you say. "I could fix that" she Allie, with a wave of her paw, the sun disappears back below the horizon, you look at her in shock, "thats kind of cool" you chuckle. As you lay down to sleep you feel the skin over your left breast, start to itch, but you ignore it and fall asleep. You are woken up to Allie licking your face like a dog, "what are you doing" you ask, "cleaning you" she answers, you grab her cheeks lightly and plant a kiss on her nose, "I think I'm clean enough" you say letting her go, she smiles at you. Suddenly she stops something on your chest, "Oh!" she says in surprise, "what is is?" you ask, looking at what she saw. On your chest, right where your heart would be was what looked like a tattoo outline of a five tailed fox that looked just like Allie that was the size of your hand, "What the...?" you say. "Its the seal" says Allie, "the seal?" you ask, "yes the seal, it marks that you and I are mates, you have gotten your's which means it is only a matter of time before I get mine" she says excitedly. "So this seal is sort of like a wedding ring?" you ask, "exactly, except it takes time for them to appear, most likely I will have mine by the end of the day today" she says.

She takes a finger and starts 'petting' the fox tattoo, to your complete surprise, the fox symbol responded when Allie touched it, it moved as if it was a real fox. After laying around for a while, playing with your new 'pet' the two of you get cleaned up and dressed, "So where should we go now?" Allie asked over an MRE ration breakfast, "well I want to make sure my brother is ok, but I also want to make sure my cabin is still there so we have a place to go" you say............
14112121213121321311.title: "Yes"

141121212131213213111.content:
"But I think its more important that I check on my brother first, you know, a cabin is just an item, it came be replaced," you say. Allie nods and rubs up against you, "then lets stop wasting time and go" she says, pecking you on the cheek, she gets up and searches through the house to finds some clothing. She returns wearing a pair of jeans and a t-shirt with a zip up hoodie in her paws, her tails poking out from under the shirt, you look down and see she was barefoot, "guess they didn't have any shoes that fit her" you think to yourself. She sits down next to you, waiting for you to finish eating.

The two of you pack up and head out, "so what kind of symbol will your seal be?" you ask as you walk along the abandoned road.
