"Your seal is the symbol for my species in your language, my seal will be the symbol for your species in my language" she says. "I've been meaning to ask..what exactly is your species?" you ask. She smiles, "I like to call myself a snow-sune, because I'm a mix of a snow leopard and a nine tailed Kitsune" she says, you walk in silence thinking of your next question, "there's just so many things I want to ask you, but I don't know where to start" you say. "Well don't worry, we have all the time in the world now" she says, kissing your cheek, making you smile and give one of her ears a rub, making her tails flow wildly.

After walking for an hour the two of you come across an abandoned Humvee, the only thing that you saw wrong with it was a flat tire, but luckily there was a spare on the back. "Either someone was too busy to change the tire or....." you say leaving the sentence hanging. You lean your M4 against the side of the Humvee and set your requisitioned M240 inside on the driver seat and get to work changing the tire, "keep watch I don't want someone sneaking up on us" you say to Allie. She nods and starts scanning the surrounding area, after a tense twenty minutes of fighting with the rusted lug nuts, expecting someone or something to sneak up on you, you finally get the tire changed and head out. After a three hour drive you make it to a house, "he lives here" says Allie, you pull up to the house and get out cautiously, expecting someone to take a shot at you.

You walk up to the door and knock..............
141121212131213213111.title: "Go see your brother first"

choices: Something walks up to one of the windows
141122.content:
You reach your hand out to open the door when suddenly, a uniformed Captain opened the door from the inside, “hello?” he asks, looking at you, at this point Thompson steps forward, “we lost radio contact with this facility and we were dispatched to investigate” he says. “Oh yes, sorry about that, our radio decided to take a dump on us and we’ve been trying to repair it, you guys didn’t happen to bring a spare with you did you?” asks the Captain, “right here” says Miller, gesturing to the duffle on his back.
The Captain nodded and yelled down the hall behind him, “Corporal take this man to the radio room” he says, Miller followed the corporal down the hallway, “come in, sorry your trip was a small one” says the Captain. The rest of you follow the Captain into the facility, the captain spins on his heel, “hey since you guys are here, do you want to see it?” he asks with a grin, “see what?” you ask, he doesn’t reply and merely gestures to follow him.

He leads you into a large room that looks more like an aircraft hanger than a laboratory, in the middle of the room was a large sealed up container with window like holes at the top and near the bottom, each window what about the size of an adult human. “There she is” he says pointing to the container, the three of you continue to give the Captain a confused look; “come look” he says walking toward the container. As you approach the container you couldn’t shake the feeling of being watched…………………..
141122.title: You enter unopposed

1411221.content:
In the blink of an eye a large paw reached out of one of the windows and grabbed you, lifting you high in the air and bringing you closer to one of the top slits, you squirm and try your best to get free, but the paw had an iron grip. Beneath you you hear all sorts of activity, men running and shouting for a containment team to get their asses in gear while the paw stopped, on the other side of the slit you saw something that made you stop, a large set of glowing blue eyes. Slowly you noticed that the more you stared at the eyes the slower time seemed to move, the noise around you going quiet as suddenly you felt the emotions of this large creature, the fear mixed in with the desire to be free, Your world was suddenly filled with pain and electricity as the containment team arrived, jabbing large cattle prods at the creature, you catching some of the shock through contact, the creature let go of you and retreated into the structure, you falling a good ten feet, hitting the ground hard and falling down coughing and buzzing from the shock.

The sound of boots mixed with people grabbing you was the next thing that you could register, you open your eyes and see Miller and Aaron picking you up with a medical team behind them with a gurney, you shake them off and stand on your own power, "what the hell is that thing?!" you almost shout at the Captain, rage overtaking your respect for rank. "That thing is the solution to all our problems, we figure this one must be of some importance because of how large it is, just imagine what we can learn from it, soon we will be able to fight these things and retake everything" he said making a fist and pointing to the concrete structure.

You rub your head and blink your eyes a bit to refocus, as your body was still feeling the after effects of the shock, "here take him and get him checked out" the Captain gestured to the gurney, but you waved them off and simple walked, not needing or wanting to be carried out.
1411221.title: Something grabs you

14113.content:
You look out the side door and watch as the terrain changed from meadow fields to snowy mountains and forests, Miller leans over to you, "we're regrouping and amassing our remaining forces, unfortunately these creatures aren't our only worry, we have enemy forces pushing in through areas of Alaska and Califor-" Miller starts saying before getting cut off mid-sentence by a sudden flash of light out side the helicopter and an alarm coming from the cockpit. "Whats going on?!" you yell over the alarm, "SAMs!" yelled the pilot, someone was trying to shoot you down, suddenly there was another alarm, "deploying flares" one of the pilots yelled into his headset, outside the Black Hawk flares shot out and the pilot rolled to the left to break the lock the missile had on the helicopter.

Suddenly there was a loud explosion followed by the helicopter tumbling out of the sky, you barely had time to ready yourself before the Black Hawk slammed into the snow packed ground before finally sliding to a halt, you are just able to look around the wrecked inside of the helo before you pass out. When you come to you were the only one inside save for the limp bodies of the pilots in their seats, slowly you check yourself for injuries. Your left ankle and right shoulder are in pain, it fells like you dislocated your shoulder and it was relocated incorrectly and you head is throbbing with a massive headache. Slowly you twist your head from side to side, cracking you neck, "aahh, at least I can make that pain go away" you say to yourself, carefully you climb out of the wrecked helicopter, mindful of your leg.

Outside you see footprints headed away, "must have been the guys" you say to yourself, slowly you begin to follow the prints, you didn't get far before a gunshot rang out and a bullet flew past your head. At the top of a hill was a group of soldiers and they were running at you, guns raised, a couple dropped down and fired off a few shots that landed in the snow around you. Quickly you raise your rifle and return fire, hitting two and scattering the rest, suddenly you become aware of a new sound, the sound of helicopter blades, just then a Ka-50 Black Shark attack helicopter crested the hill and came bearing down on you, "Oh shi-" you start just as the Black Shark opened fire with its 30mm gun.

You dive out of the way of the oncoming strafing run and look around for a means of escape, behind you was the dense forest and to your right was a large selection of caves and mountains to possibly hide in, you turn and watch the Black Shark as it makes a quick roll before coming back around............................
14113.title: Something happens

choices: one of the soldiers followed you in
141132.content:
You turn in the direction of the caves, realizing that they would offer the best form of protection against the attack chopper's armament, you half run, half limp towards the nearby caves, the sounds of the helicopter getting closer as it turned around to make another pass. Just as you made it to the mouth of the cave the Blackshark completed its turn and opened up with the main gun again, the rock and snow around you exploding in a fury of sparks and powder. In one last burst of energy you dive into the cave and land on your injured shoulder, gasping out loudly as the chopper breaks off again, quickly you crawl inside and get to your feet, turning on your light and running deeper into the cave.

After running for what seemed like forever, you stop and turn around, not seeing or hearing anyone follow you, you lean against the cave wall and sit down, holding your throbbing shoulder. You close your eyes and sigh, waiting for the pain to subside, but the sudden sound of footsteps made you stand up,switching off your flashlight you stand in silence, waiting to see who it was......
141132.title: Head to the caves

1413.content:
As the BlackHawk neared you it turned so that the pilot side was facing you,(right side), the side door slid open. To your surprise you spot the familiar shape of a gun barrel pointing in your direction, you take a small step backwards. Suddenly, to your horror, the helicopter opens fire on you, a line of rounds striking the ground, stitch their way towards you. Before the rounds could hit you, you dive away and take off running, "why would they shoot me?" you say to yourself as you seek shelter from the now hostile BlackHawk. You glance over your shoulder and see the BlackHawk give chase, you look around and see no great way to fight back.

As you run you come across a road full of abandon car and trucks, you take cover behind what was a one point a eighteen wheeler. You look around to try to figure out what to do next because you knew you had minutes at the most before that helicopter came around. As you look around you knew you really had two options: Fight or Flight.......
1413.title: It shoots at you

choices: It comes around to finish the job
14133.content:
You look around the strew of vehicles around you and then an idea pops in your head, instead of just running or making what could possibly be your last stand against this superior helo, but try and cripple the chopper long enough to escape. Before you could formulate a plan the sound of a ricocheting bullet refocused your attention, the BlackHawk had swung around so that the gunner had a better angle on you, but you didn't give the gunner the chance to open fire, instead you raised your weapon and emptied the whole magazine into the BlackHawk causing it to break off. You duck down and reload and that's when you noticed the eighteen wheeler's cargo; cars.

You run to the end vehicle and break into the driver side door and get to work hot wiring the ignition, "come on, come on, come on!" you say to yourself in frustration. Finally after what felt like an hour of waiting you finally start the car, you climb in, launch yourself off the trailer and take off down the road. You look in the mirror and see the BlackHawk give chase, "jeez what does this guy want?!" you say in anger as you stomp on the gas, putting the petal to the floor, but the helo was still gaining on you. Unfortunately the car you chose was more of a SUV rather than a sports car, but it wasn't long before a city was in view, "maybe I can lose him in here" you say, spotting many tall, skyscraper like buildings.

Alas, luck was still not quite on your side, as a stream of round impacted your windshield, you duck down, avoiding the most of the shattered glass, you sit up, rifle in one hand and open fire, one handed, out the now shattered windshield. In one quick motion you drop the empty mag, reload and still manage to steer around abandon cars in the middle of the road. Just as you enter the city another stream of bullets cut into the engine block and wheel well, killing the engine and shredding both tires on the left side causing you to lose control and smash into the side of a building. The force of the airbags momentarily dazed you, but you soon recovered, you climb out of the wrecked car and take cover, weapon raised and scanned the sky for the helo.........
14133.title: Both?

141333.content:
Before you could finish scanning the sky for the missing BlackHawk you hear a voice call out, "yo up here" said a male voice followed by a gloved hand waving from what looked like an apartment balcony. You get up from your hiding spot and make your way toward the apartment building, suddenly the Black Hawk reappeared and opened fire again, bullets snapped and ricocheted all around you, but your only focus was on getting to the apartment building. You stop by a burned out car and emptied another mag at the helo, focusing your fire on the engine cowl and the cockpit, you reload and continue running.

After emptying two more magazines you finally make it to the apartment building where the male signaled you over, you locate a stairwell and look up, there were at least ten floors that you had to climb. You swear to yourself and start the long climb up the stairs, by the time you reach the floor where you saw the hand you are almost out of breath, you kick open the door that leads onto the catwalk-like balcony that connected the two buildings. Suddenly you are surrounded by another flurry of lead as the BlackHawk resumes shooting at you, you dive for the cover offered by the concrete wall/railing surrounding the catwalk/balcony, "fuckfuckFUCKfuckfuckFUCK!" you yell to yourself with your hands over your head as the walls around you explode into dust.

You look up and to your surprise there was one of those human-like fox creatures at first you thought he had killed the person that signaled you earlier, but then you realized the gloved hand you saw was his black furred hand. He, like you, was taking cover from the helo, he was looking at you and saying something, but the combination of the shooting and the BlackHaw's rotors made it impossible to hear what he was saying. You point to your ears and then shake your head, letting him know you couldn't hear him, he picks up a rock and makes a pulling motion near the tip and then points at you, you were really good at charades, but you couldn't figure out what he was trying to tell you.

Suddenly there was a lull in the shooting so the fox took advantage of that opportunity and shouted to you, "Grena-" but you only heard the beginning of the message as the BlackHawk started shooting again. "Grena-?, grenade!" you think to yourself, finally figuring out what the fox was asking for, you reach into your vest and pull out a grenade and show it to the fox, he nods his head, you rolling over to him, he grabs it and then points to you and makes a shooting gesture.

You nod and stick your rifle over the concrete railing and pop off a couple of shots to keep the BlackHawk focused on you while the fox readied the grenade. You duck back down to reload and are just in time to see the spoon fly off the grenade and then the fox lobbed it at the helo.......
141333.title: Someone signals you

choices: He leads you back to his home
He leads you to more Anthros and one of them has a bone to pick with you
1413331.content:
You watch the grenade fly toward the helicopter, but to your disappointment the grenade came up a foot short and exploded harmlessly underneath the BlackHawk, but to your surprise, the helicopter flew off and left. "Must've scared them off" you say to yourself, you refocus your attention to the fox, he was standing up and was signaling you to follow him. You shake your head at him, you didn't trust this fox, even if he saved you and scared off the helo, he was still your enemy. He must have thought you were wounded, because he started walking over to you, you quickly get to your feet and aim at him, "back off" you order, "its ok I won't hurt you" he says, walking towards you, paws up like he was surrendering.

"Back off" you order again, but the fox still ignored you and continued towards you, you let off a warning shot near his foot, making him stop. "Listen if I really wanted to kill or hurt you, I would've let that chopper finish you off and just sat by watching, but I didn't." he says. You wrestle with the thought of killing this fox and moving on or following him, "alright, but no funny stuff" you finally say, lowering you rifle, he nods and you follow him. He leads you into the other apartment building, you nervously follow him, looking around expecting to be led into a trap...........
1413331.title: He missed

14133312.content:
As you follow the fox, he leads you into what at one point was some type of community center inside the apartment complex. Inside you see at least ten other anthros like the fox, there were even a couple anthro children huddled up next to their mothers. As you walk into the room all eyes drifted to you, a six foot tall, male wolf ran into the room, "David what happened out ther---" he starts, but stops when he sees you, "YOU?!" he says. You recognized the wolf as the same one that attacked you a week earlier, he had tried to make a meal out of you, but you gotten the upper hand and left him handcuffed to drain pipe in an alleyway with a concussion. "Come back for an ass kicking did you?" he snarls at you, you go to raise your weapon at him, hoping to keep him at bay, but he quickly closes the gap and slaps your rifle away, he grabs you by your vest and slams you into the nearby wall.

"Collin let him go he---" says the fox, but the wolf cut him off, "he left me handcuffed in an alley, I think I'm allowed a little revenge" he says, showing his teeth. You bring your arms down on his elbows, breaking his hold on you, you head butt him using your helmet to your advantage, sending the wolf stumbling backwards, clutching his muzzle/head, "why you little.." he says, charging at you. You run at him, roaring with you head tucked, you hit him just under the chest, lifting him up and the two of you go crashing into a table, breaking it in two with you on top of the wolf, you reach down and pull your boot knife and hold it up against his throat, "go ahead do it...DO IT!!!" the wolf snarls at you.

You were about to finish off the wolf when something clicked, you look up and see everyone in the room was watching you with fear filled eyes, mothers were clutching their children tighter, as you look around you notice a majority of the anthros in the room were women and children. You sheath your knife and climb off the downed wolf, "hey we're not finished!" growled the wolf, you ignore him and walk over and retrieve your discarded rifle, the wolf gets up and spins you around and grabs you by the throat, but not tight enough to choke you, "I said I'm not finished with you" he growls again, "yeah well I'm done" you say removing your vest and helmet, "so if you want to finish me then go right ahead, I won't stop you, I've already had someone try to kill me once today so go on" you say tossing your arms up in the air in defeat. The wolf growls at you, teeth bared, his eyes filled hate and anger, his grip on your throat started to tighten and your vision starts to fade..................
14133312.title: He leads you to more Anthros and one of them ha...

142.content:
The sound of a car engine grabs your attention, you look around and spot a dust cloud in the distance and it was getting closer. You dropped into a crouch and observed the car as it neared your hiding spot, you guessed that if the car continued on its path it would pass a couple feet in front of you. As the car got about half a mile away you dropped into a prone position and prayed that the driver didn't accidentally run you over. Suddenly you hear the car stop and judging from the sound it had stopped a couple yards in front of you, you hear the sound of doors opening and people walking around, "we can't just leave her here" said a female voice. "What choice do we have, we don't have the food and water to take care of her, or would you rather put her out of her misery instead?" said a male voice.

"No you're right, she will stand a better chance on her own I guess" said the female. "Come on, say your goodbyes and lets get going" said the male again. you hear the sound of a door opening followed by the sound of an animal collar jingling. The female started talking to what you assumed was an pet, she was talking so quietly you couldn't hear what she was saying, but you could tell she was starting to cry. After what seemed like fifteen minutes the male and female get in their car and leave, but you heard the sounds of an animal making sad whimpering sounds, it was heartbreaking for you to lay there and listen to this animal make these noises. You slowly get to your feet and standing there was a.....
142.title: Car

14212.content:
As you stand up out of the tall wheat you see, sitting in the road, was an animal, at first you thought it was a wolf, but a closer look revealed it was just a gray husky. You stand there watching the dog to see what it would do, it let out a huffs and started to whine before laying down on the road, slowly you make your way over. The dog either didn't know you were there or didn't care, you sit down next to the husky and carefully reach out, instantly the dog sits up and looks at you so fast, you thought it was going to bite, but it merely sniffed your hand.

Cautiously you start to pet the dog's head, quickly the husky get to its feet and using it forepaws, pushed you onto your back, "what....?" you say, before you try to get up, the husky drapes itself across your chest. "You are an odd one aren't you?" you ask the husky who merely stares at you with puppy eyes, "wanna come with me?" you ask, the dog starts licking your face, as if answering your question.

You playfully fend off the barrage of tongue, "alright alright, I'll take that as a yes" you say stroking the dogs head. The two of you lay on the ground for a little before the dog decides to get off you, "do you have a name?" you say, looking at the collar, on the collar was a name tag that looked like a bone with the name..............
14212.title: Husky

choices: The next morning, business as normal
The next morning, something seem off about Sara
1422.content:
Sitting on a dirt road that you didn't notice before was a fox with red/brown fur and a collar around its neck with what looked like a name tag. The fox's ears were drooped as it looks in the direction that the car drove off, the fox had yet to take notice of you until you started to make your way towards it. The fox spun around and struck a defensive posture and let out a warning growl at you, you made yourself as non-threatening as possible as you approached the fox, "its ok, I'm not going to hurt you" you say calmly as you neared the fox. Surprisingly the fox didn't try to bite or attack you in any way as you reached it, it only gave you small growls, you hold out one of your hands for it to smell and while it was distracted you reached for the collar to read the name tag. "Lets find out your name shall we?" you say to the fox, inscribed on the heart shaped tag was the name Sara, "well Sara, would you like to come with me?" you say to the fox, but the fox gave you another one of its growls. "Well ok then, I'll be seeing you around then" you say, giving the fox a small pet on the head and then you get up and walk away, leaving the fox standing there in the road alone again.

After following the road for an hour you spot a farm so you make your way towards it, the front door and windows on the house were completely destroyed so you approach with your weapon raised. You decide to check out the barn first instead of the house, the barn was in better shape than the house. Inside you found the barn to be deserted with no sign of any animal having lived inside, "ok I think I'll stay here for tonight" you say to yourself. You turn back and enter the house with more caution than the barn, the front door was laying on the floor inside with claw marks on it, "I hope whoever lived here got out ok" you think to yourself. As you search the house you found no signs of a struggle, in fact it looked like a couple anthros broke in and found nobody home and left, you head to the second floor to get blankets so you could sleep in the barn for the night. As you enter a bedroom you hear what sounds like jingling and the sound of claws on wood, you freeze as you listen for the noise again, you peek over the banister at the first floor to try to find the source of the noise. You spot a bushy tail sticking out of the doorway that leads to the kitchen, "what the..." you say silently, the tail disappears into the kitchen followed by the jingling noise and the light scratching sound again, suddenly you hear a whimpering sound emanate from the kitchen.

You put together everything and suddenly the answer to your question pops in your head, "Sara?" you yell, you hear a yip sound come from the kitchen. You climb down the stairs and stand in the doorway to the kitchen, "Sara" you say again, a familiar fox head pops around the corner and spots you, you drop to a knee, "change your mind did ya?" you say, she runs over and starts licking your face. You reach up with two hands and scratch her behind the ears causing her tail to go wild, "I guess you're staying with me huh?" you say to Sara, she responds with a small bark. You resume gathering supplies from the house and moving them into the barn, by the time you got set up in your new home for the night, the sun had started to drop below the horizon so you make dinner with the food you found for you and Sara.

After eating you lock up the barn from the inside to keep any anthros out during the night, you and Sara head up to the upper loft where you had the pillow and blankets from the house laid out. You climb under the blankets and lay down, just before you drift off to sleep you feel movement under the covers, suddenly Sara's head pops out from the blanket and looks at you. "Well this is interesting" you say, she lets out a yawn and lays her head on your arm, "good night" you say, brushing her head, soon the two of you were asleep......
1422.title: A boy and his Fox

14222.content:
You are awoken to something wet and slimy being dragged across your face, you crack open your eyes and see a familiar face staring at you, "good morning Sara, is it time to get up already" you say, still half asleep. "Well I guess ten more minutes won't hurt" was the response you weren't expecting. Your eyes shoot open, laying, cuddled up to you, was Sara, but she no longer looked like a normal fox, instead she had human qualities like all the anthro creatures you were running from in the first place.

Sara must have heard your heart rate increase because she lifted her head and looked at you, "what's wrong?" she asks.

"Your n-n-not a normal fox are you?" you ask, fear slowing filling your voice, Sara's ears droop lower than when you first meet her, "I'm sorry I thought you would be ok with me like this" she says in a sad voice, she starts to get up to leave.

You reach out and stop her, "why are you leaving?" you ask, "because you don't feel safe around me, don't lie I can tell" she says. Truth was you were afraid of her, but you soon realized that if she meant you harm you wouldn't be breathing right now, "you're right I don't feel safe around you, but I realize now you don't want to hurt me, and now I don't feel so afraid of you" you say.

Her ears perk up, "really?" she asks, you nod. She suddenly jumps forward and half hugs you and half tackles you. She then proceeds to give you a full on french kiss, you lightly force her back, freeing yourself, "what was that?" you ask, Sara ignores you and begins undoing your pants and jacket. "What are you doing?" you ask again, "just repaying you for taking me in" she says with a seductive grin..........
14222.title: Foxy lady

142221.content:
You find yourself attracted to Sara despite the fact you barely knew her and you didn't sit well with the rest of her species. You start removing your jacket and shirt and Sara removes your pants and underwear, you didn't even finish getting your t-shirt off your head before Sara resumed kissing you. It wasn't long before your 'soldier' was standing at attention, she inserted it into her sex and began moving up and down. The two of you continue for what feel like hours of pure ecstasy before the both of you climax at the same time, "how was your first time with someone like me?" Sara pants as she lays her head on your chest. "That.......was very interesting" you say, running a hand through her matted fur, she gives you a small lick on the cheek.

After laying around for a little, you both get cleaned up and eat a little breakfast before heading out on the road. "So where were you going before you met me?" Sara asks, "heh....um nowhere in particular, I was just trying to get away from those creatures, no offense" you say, she waves a dismissive paw, "none taken" she says. "I have a suggestion, some of my friends and family are living in what you humans call Seattle" she says. "but what about me" you ask, "don't worry the furries, as we go by, live in harmony with the humans that still remain in the city" she says. "Well we're going to need to find some wheels unless you like walking" you say, she nods her head in agreement. For hours the two of you walk along the barren road, no vehicles in sight, "I hope you brought enough water for the two of us" Sara says, just then you spot a building in the distance, using your rifle scope you can tell it is a gas station, but the best part was a car was outside. "I think I just found our ride" you say with a grin on your face, you both take of at a small jog towards the station.

Soon you both make it and see that the car was a 1973 Hemi Barracuda and it was in a good condition, as you look inside you see it was packed full of useless items like golf clubs and electronics. You pop the trunk and see it was also filled with useless items, "tsk tsk tsk, its sad how some people think they can just pack up their lives and take it with them" you say quietly to yourself. You and Sara clean out the car and only repack anything of use, you gas up the car and fill up any gas cans you could find, you also salvage any food from inside the station before driving away.

The previous owner left behind an interesting collection of music with the car, currently the two of you were listening to a Led Zeppelin song while you were driving. For most of the day the two of you listen to every song in the collection with you answering every question Sara had about the bands. Your favorite comment she made was about The Beatles, it went something along the lines of "how can tiny bugs make music?". Eventually it gets dark out so you pull over for the night because you didn't have any night vision goggles and you didn't want to be driving with the lights on and potentially attract unwanted attention.

You and Sara climb in the back seat and use it as a makeshift bed, "hey I have to tell you something" she says, "sure what is it?" you ask. "Well I know I haven't known you for long, but I think I'm having feelings for you" she says shyly. This catches you off guard a little, although Sara was very attractive and the two of you did have sex in the barn that morning, you were till unsure of your feeling towards her because like she said, you haven't known her that long. You must have been taking a while to answer because Sara brushed your face with her tail, "did you hear me?" she asks, " yeah I think......"
142221.title: Let her continue

choices: You run into a group of humans
1422211.content:
"I'm having feelings for you too" you say, Sara gives you a large smile and moves to kiss you, "but" you say interrupting her, " I think we need to take it slow because as you said, we barely know each other" you add. She nods and gives you a light kiss on the cheek, "you're right, but lets get some sleep, we have a long day tomorrow" she says, resting her head on your chest and falling asleep. You close your eyes and soon your asleep too, you open your eyes and find yourself still in the backseat, but bound and gagged, you could feel the car was driving, "that lying piece of.... she was just fooling me!" you say to yourself. You begin struggling against your bindings, you must have made enough noise to grab Sara's attention because she looked back at you, "oh your finally awake" she says, she pulls over and hops in the back and sits you up. "Let me go!" you yell through the gag, "hang on, just calm down first and let me explain" she says as she frees your mouth, but you kept your mouth shut and refrained from yelling any expletives at her, giving her a chance to explain herself.

"There was a group of furs that liked to harm humans that came by earlier and I convinced them you were my slave by tying you up like that, honest" she says with her ears lowered, expecting you to lash out at her, but you kept your calm. You sigh, "can you untie me please?" you ask in a calm voice, she nods and frees your arms and legs, "are you mad at me?" she asks in a quiet voice, her face looked that of a child who knew they did something wrong and were expecting to get punished. "I'm not really mad at you, after all, you kind of saved me" you say, setting your hands on her shoulders," really?" she says, her ears perking up, you nod, she gave you a hug, but a gentler one compared to the one she gave you in the barn. After she releases you she pecks you on the lips and climbs back over into the front passenger seat, "come on lazy bones" she says patting the driver seat.

You smile to yourself and gracefully make your way over, soon the two of you were back on the road to Seattle, "so I have to ask, how did you know how to drive a stick shift?' you ask. "Easy, I watched you do it and I'm a quick learner" she says, laying her head across your lap, "but I'm not used to driving for long periods like you" she says tiredly. "How long were you driving?' you ask, "umm I drove I think for about four or five hours while you slept" she says, "wow was I really out that long?" you ask. "Eh I got up early and drove because I couldn't sleep and I figured it was best to get a head start on today's drive" she says, her eyes fluttering shut, she wrapped her arms around your mid section, "do me one last favor" she say sleepily, "sure" you say, "try not to hit any pot holes while I'm asleep" she says, "you chuckle, "ok, I promise" you say petting her head as she finally drifts off to sleep.
1422211.title: I'm having feeling too

1423.content: What tip of animal was it?
1423.title: Other

143.content: You hear the sound of the wheat rustling, at first you though it was just the wind blowing through, but you didn't feel any wind. You start looking around and spot a figure about 100 feet away, you raise your rifle and look through the scope and see the figure was......
143.title: Someone was coming

1432.content:
To your relief the figure you see in the distance is human like you, but you are hesitant to reveal yourself because there is the chance that he or she might try to take a shot at you. Slowly you follow the unknown figure, making sure to keep your distance, for over an hour you follow the figure though the wheat field and into a small city. You follow the figure down the street, towards one of the abandoned stores, you peek around the corner of the shattered door, switching your hat for your helmet before heading in.

Rummaging through some trash and rubble was female about your height, wearing old and well used clothing, "hello" you say cautiously, she quickly spun around and spotted you. Quickly she pulled a knife out of her pocket, "hey its ok, calm down" you say raising your rifle slightly, as soon a she saw you were human too she dropped the knife and hugged you, catching you off guard.

"Oh thank god I thought I was alone" she says, crying into your shoulder, all you could do was stand there in surprise.

"Well you're not now" you say, putting a reassuring hand on her back..................
1432.title: Human

14321.content:
The sudden click of a hammer being cocked back made you freeze "don't move, arms where I can see them" a gruff voice commanded, the cold metal of a barrel touching your neck made you do as the voice commanded, slowly moving your arms out as the female took your gun and moved away from you. "no funny moves and you walk away alive" she said, "you're making a mistake, i can help you" you try to tell them. That only got the man behind you to jab the gun into the base of your skull "shut up!" he yelled. The female came over, your own gun pointed at you as she started digging through your vest and pants, she opened a vest pocket and out fell a photo that was very meaningful to you, letting it fall to the ground, "hey thats mine!" you start, moving towards it which got you a swift hit on the back with a foot from the male, "no moving!!". Slowly you stand up from the hit and go back to acting like a statue, glaring menacing at the female as she continued, feeling the gun touch your back you got a good idea where it was, now it was only a matter of time when to spring into action for you.

Suddenly the female dropped something that she pulled out of your pocket and thats when you made your move, turning quickly, hitting the mans arm that held the gun, making it go off, he struggled to bring the gun back around as you moved on him, not seeing what happened to the female. You hit him squarely in the jaw, trying to grab the gun from him, grunting as the gun shifted from you, to him and back to you, you grunt and bring a knee up, hitting him in the gut and grabbing the pistol from him, but before you could say anything he pulled out a small caliber revolver and fired as you did, you hitting him in the heart and him hitting you in the head, plunging everything into darkness as your limp bodies fell back, yours landing next to the dead female, who seemed to have caught the first round from the scuffle.
14321.title: Its a trap

choices: Decline the mark(no marks on hand)
143212.content:
You don't know how long it has been in that limbo-like state weeks, days, years however after endless riddles and puzzles you finally wake up with the in the same place where your confrontation with the woman and man has been you recover your gear and loot anything useful.You find a machete, food, bullets, guns and makeup seems that these dicks had more than they seemed to have the first order of business was to use the conveniently found makeup to cover your wound as you find a mirror you start to use the makeup

As you were applying the make up your mind starts to think of the limbo and the gut-wrenching trials you had to go through you certainly remember the overseer a person who goes by the "Outsider" who judged the trials. Provided your experience as an army ranger and the apocalypse it was a piece of cake to you to win the trials.Impressed by the way the way you used your wits, skills, and, experience to your advantages, the outsider offered a gift before escaping; His mark.

The choice was up to you to choose no consequences you get the advantages of his mark if you accept it and you don't have to form a cult or anything to repay it, he only offered it because you were the fist to entertain him and he was known to be the fairest of them all.
If you don't accept it was fine nothing would happen and you will live normally. You finish applying the makeup and then you recall your answer to him you look to your hand to see the result of the answer.
(note: if you choose to accept you get many powers not only those of dishonored anything you want could be applied)
143212.title: you survive

144.content:
You look around and determine that the noise you heard was just a bird, you spot what looks like a house off in the distance. You use your rifle scope to get a better look, the house looked a little run down and showed no signs of anybody living there recently. You make your way towards the house, after an hour of walking you get close enough to the house that you can see the front door had been ripped of the hinges and all the windows smashed. You are starting to have second thoughts about entering the house so you turn to leave, suddenly you feel like someone just hit you in the chest with a sledge hammer, knocking the breath out of your lungs and sending you flying backwards at least three feet before coming to a stop.

You attempt to breath, but your chest hurt so much that it seemed impossible, still you manage to draw a small breath of air. You unzip your vest and check yourself and find that the round had not passed through your vest's ballistic plates, but you felt an excruciating pain on your left side, just below the nipple. "Yep thats a broken rib" you say through clenched teeth, suddenly you hear the sound of footsteps making their way toward you.........
144.title: You spot a house in the distance

choices: "Need to ask you a few questions" (interrogation)
1441.content:
As you lay on the ground you hear the sound of people running towards you, you look over and see your rifle laying on the ground next to you. You roll over and start crawling towards the rifle, just as you set your hand on it a boot stomps on your rifle, you look up in time to see a rifle butt striking you in the face, knocking you out. When you wake up you find yourself stripped of your weapons, lying on the floor, and your hands and feet tied up, "where am I?" you say quietly.

From what you could see, you were in a windowless room, the only source of light was a single bulb hanging from a wire and the floor was bare. You hear a door open and the sound of multiple people walking down stairs, "who's there?" you say, looking around, trying to locate whoever was with you. "Wow awake so soon, I guess I didn't hit you hard enough" said a female voice, "please just let me go" you plead, suddenly a human female dressed in slightly ragged clothing walked into the light, she walks over to you and examines you before looking over her shoulder.

"You two get over here and do something useful" she orders to someone that yo couldn't see, soon two males dressed in similar clothes walked over and grabbed your arms and legs, "What are you doing?" you say a little panicked. The female grins at you, "we...."
1441.title: Bandits

14412.content:
"Well with the gear we 'lifted' from you, we no longer need your services" she says with an evil grin, you look at her in shock as you realize what this means, "no please, let me join you or something' you plead. She smiles at you, "well as much as I would like to have someone of your specialty, we already have too many mouths to feed, which reminds me...." she says, looking over at one of the males holding your arms and legs, "I think the girls are getting hungry" she says, her evil grin getting bigger. They let out an evil laugh as they blindfold you and carry you off, after a good fifteen minute walk, you feel your captors setting you down, removing the blindfold, and cutting your leg restrains, but they left your arms bound.

You find yourself in some type of cage, "what is this?" you say looking around, "did you ever see StarWars?" the female asks, "yeah" you say confused, "you know the one were Skywalker tries to rescue his frozen friend?" she asks again, "yeah, what are you getting at?" you ask, even more confused. "What happened to Skywalker?" she asks, "he fell through the trap--" you stop and look down, suddenly the floor beneath you gives out and you fall a short distance before landing on your injured side in a sandy pit. You lay on the ground in pain and thats when you noticed a large steel door on the other end of the pit, you hear a loud thunk before the door starts to rise, on the other side you could hear growling noises.

You manage to get to your knees when the door was all the way up, but nothing came out. You look and see at least five sets of eyes glowing in the dark, glaring at you, you look around the room and see no way out except the room with the glowing eyes, that's when you realized there was only one thing you could do........
14412.title: "No longer need you"

144121.content:
As you watched the first creature come into the light you saw it was a female jaguar, behind her you saw an odd combination of a wolf and snow leopard and she had strange fox tails, (yes tails). Flowing behind her were four long fox-like tails, behind her you saw a cougar, a golden retriever, and two more sets of glowing eyes in the dark. You sigh in defeat, even with a rifle and ammo, you still didn't have a chance to defeat these six creatures, you bow your head in defeat and could only hope that they will take some pity on you.

The cougar and wolf/leopard/fox walk over to you, you stay on your knees with your head bowed like you were praying. The hybrid leaned forward and started to sniff you, she turned to the cougar and whispered something to her.

You lift your head and peek at the cougar, she looks at you and nods to the wolf, she gives you an almost friendly smile, which bugged you.

The cougar turns to the golden retriever and the jaguar, "grab him" she says, they walk over and grab you by your legs, dragging you into the door they came from, "please just end it quickly thats all I ask of you" you plead, they look at each other and laugh.

They set you in the middle of the poorly lit room, slowly your eyes adjust to the light, you could see the wolf/leopard/fox hybrid standing next to you and the cougar was leaning over you. Her claws pop out and see reaches out towards you, you whimper and close your eyes, "this is it I guess" you say to yourself, suddenly you feel your arms being freed. You look at the cougar in surprise, "why--" before you could say anymore, she silences you with a paw over the mouth, she points above at the ceiling, "when I say to, start screaming like we're tearing you apart ok?" she whispers in your ear, you nod confused.

She stand back up "I guess dinner's server girls!" she says out loud, suddenly you hear the sound of cloth tearing, and then the cougar points to you so you let out the loudest bloodcurdling scream you could manage. The wolf/leopard/fox cut you off abruptly with her paws, just then you hear voices coming from the first room, "well I guess that's that" you recognize as the female that threw you down here, then you hear the sounds of multiple footsteps leaving.

The cougar hugs you, squishing you in her large cleavage, "you did well, now for part two" she says setting you down, "part two? hang on whats going on?!" you say confused. You hear giggling behind you, "aww look the human's all confused, explain it to him Sarah" you look over your shoulder and see the golden retriever sitting behind you. The cougar sits in front of you, "well lets start with introductions, I'm Sarah and that's Ramona hiding behind you" she say pointing to the dog, "this is Matilda and that bundle of joy over there is Arokh" she says pointing to the jaguar and the hybrid, the jaguar waved to you, but the wolf/leopard just let out a light growl at Sarah.

"Wait I saw six sets of eyes" you say looking around the room and then you spot a tiger and a husky sitting away from you, "ah yes, that is Mira and Fay" says Sarah.

"So what is part two?" you ask, "part two of our plan" says Ramona, "they feed us one human, once a week so our strength isn't great enough to escape" Sarah explains, you look at her confused, "how do I fit in with all this?" you ask. "We you se you are going to feed yourself to us and we will gain enough energy that we can break outta here" she says, you look at her in horror, "hang on hang on.....how am I going to 'feed' all six of you?" you ask. "Well after weeks of saving up energy I can reform you each time, so I can reform you after feeding you to whoever is number six and you can escape with us" says Sarah.

You sit there thinking, "and if I refuse?" you ask, "well then we go through with the plan, but don't reform you in the end" says Ramona. "How do I know you will reform me in the end if I agree?" you ask, Sarah shrugs, "you'll just have to trust us then" says Arohk..........
144121.title: Give up

1441211.content:
You nod, "I guess you're right, alright lets do this before I change my mind" you say, "ok, Ramona you're up first" says Sarah. Ramona turns to you, "start stripping, clothing tends to get in the way" she says, you hesitate for a minute, "what is it?" Sarah asks, "its just that this feels weird, me willingly doing this" you tell her, she giggles.

You strip down to your underwear, "no all of it" says Ramona, you pause, you could feel you face burning red, "its alright you can take 'em off, its not like we haven't seen one before" says Ramona. You remove your underwear and set them on your pile of clothes, Ramona walks over to you and gives you a hug, "if it make you feel better, it'll be quick and painless" she says into your ear, you shrug. You close your eyes just as you feel her mouth lowering over you head, you open your eyes, but all you saw was darkness, it was warm and her slimy dog-like tongue ran over you face. Just as her jaws passed over your shoulders, you feel Ramona lifting you up with amazing strength and used gravity to help her. In three quick gulps, all that was sticking out of her mouth were your feet, she plays with you feet using her tongue before finally sending the rest of you down her gullet.

You are forces to curl up in the tight, warm sack that was her stomach, you feel her hand rubbing were your head would be, "is it too late to back out?" you yell, you hear Ramona laugh, suddenly she lets out a loud belch, sucking out the remainder of your air. It wasn't long before you felt light headed from lack of oxygen, soon you black out as the first wave of gurgles emanate around you.

You open your eyes and to your complete surprise you are back in the dark room, you start shivering, suddenly cold from no longer sharing Ramona's body heat. You see Sarah walk over to you and wrap you up in her arms, pulling you close to her body to warm you, "that wasn't so bad now was it?" she says, "it was....interesting, but very odd" you say through chattering teeth, you look over and see Ramona sitting there, rubbing her swollen gut, licking her muzzle, "not bad tasting" she says. you let out a nervous chuckle, "who-o n-next?" you say,s till shivering despite Sarah's attempt to warm you up...........
1441211.title: Agree

choices: The next morning: the great escape
One of the bandits found you
14412111.content:
"Well I guess I'm next" says Sarah, she moves your head towards her open mouth, "here we go again" you think to yourself as your head enters her mouth. Like before with Ramona, Sarah ran her tongue over your face repeatedly, coating your face in her warm saliva, despite having razor sharp teeth, she took extra care not to draw blood. As soon as she got to your shoulders she copied Ramona and lifted you up, and used gravity to her advantage, but it took her five gulps until she got to your calves, she reached down and started to rub her gut as you entered your second stomach today. In one final gulp, she swallows the last of you, as you curl up again, you could hear her purring loudly, "Ramona was right, you're not bad tasting" she purrs, rubbing her enlarged belly.

Like before, it was only a mater of time before you passed out from lack of oxygen, this time when you woke up, you were pressed up against Matilda, you look over and see Sarah with a bulging stomach like Ramona. "So how exactly does this work?" you ask, pointing to the bulges that were...well you. "Well you see after a while my stomach starts to--" "no no no...I get that I meant was how do you keep reforming me. I mean am I a clone or something?" you interrupt. Sarah makes a face as she tries to think of a way to explain this to you, "sort of, but you're still the original you, I mean......its difficult to explain" she says, you nod, that explanation was better than no explanation.

For the rest of the day the eating process was repeated for Matilda, Mira, and Fay, they would swallow you up to your shoulders before using gravity to assist them. You would curl up in their stomach and pass out before digestion really set in, but when it got to Arohk she wanted to do something different. "Its a little something I always wanted to try, don't worry you'll still reform in the end like we promised" she said, you look behind you, Ramona, Matilda, Mira, and Fay were laying down, sleeping off their meals, but Sarah stayed awake, probably to keep an eye on you, Sarah nodded, "its ok, you'll be reformed again, a deals a deal" she says. You turn to Arohk, "ok what did you want to try?" you ask, she didn't say anything, she grabbed you and hugged you tightly, her tails wrapping around you, you were completely surprised by the sudden change in events, you set you head on her shoulder, getting a good face-full of her fur, suddenly you feel yourself sinking into Arohk.

Before you knew it you were curled up in her stomach, "well that was......odd" you say, you settle into the most comfortable position and wait for oxygen depravation to take its toll. Soon you wake up laying next to Arohk and Sarah, "see everything's back to normal...well almost normal" says Sarah, Arohk hands your clothing to you, because of todays 'events' you are exhausted so as you get dressed, you only managed to get your pants and underwear on before you fall asleep............
14412111.title: "Me"

144121111.content:
You are awoken to a wetness dragging across your face, you crack your eyes open and see a golden retriever staring at you, "what is is now Roxy?" you say in a tired voice, "who's Roxy?" the retriever asked. You sit up and open your eyes fully and thats when you remembered where you were, "sorry Ramona, you reminded me of...never mind" you say, rubbing you eyes, Ramona tilts her head at you. You look around and see the others were still asleep, their stomaches no longer bulging from their 'meal', "whats going on" you say in a low whisper, "I figured i'd wake you and give you a chance to finish getting dressed and all before the main event" she says.

You thank her and start putting your clothes back on, as you tie up your boots you feel Ramona moving closer to you, you turn around and there she was, less than an arms length from you, "yes?" you ask. "I was wondering, who is Roxy?" she asks, you sigh, "I'll tell you what, answer my question and I'll answer your's, deal?" you say, ramona nods. "Ok, mine's kind of a two-part: where did all you guys come from and why the hatred of humans?" you ask, "ok well the first answer is easy, we've been here on Earth the whole time, just living in secret and the second part is we are going after humans because they are destroying and polluting everything, your constant fighting with each other with war and crime and hate is too much" she says.

You sit on the ground in silence while you digest the info she gave you, she must have though you forgot about your part of the deal because she nudged to and brought you out of your thoughts. "Wha...oh sorry, anyways, Roxy was my pet retriever like you and you reminded me of her because she used to wake me up the same way" you say, "she was your pet?" Ramona asks, confused and with a small trace of anger deep in her voice. "Well more like a family member, she was a stray and I rescued her, slowly bringing her back to health and integrating her as a member of my family, so she was more than just a pet to me" you say, "oh well....where is she?" Ramona asks.

"One day we were at the park like we usually did, I threw a tennis ball and she went through some bushes after it....and that was the last time I saw her, to this day I don't know what happened" you say starting to tear up, "about a week later a friend of mine found........." you stop, choking on your words, Ramona grabs you and pulls you into a hug and starts stroking the back of your head, "...I told him it couldn't be her because there was no collar, but he told me I was suffering from grief..." you say, full out sobbing. Surprisingly the others stayed asleep, after a good five minutes of crying you stop with a little help from Ramona, the sound of her heartbeat and being wrapped up in her fur helped calm you down. "I'm sorry about Roxy and maybe I was wrong about all humans, there are those out there like you who aren't all evil I guess" says Ramona, You reach up and scratch her behind the ears, causing her tail to go wild, she gives you a good lick across the face, "still not bad tasting" she says with a smile.

You laugh at her joke as she lets go of you and wakes up the others, as they stretch you notice they seem to be full of renewed energy from the meals and some 'extra additions' to certain areas. "All good to go?" asks Sarah, everyone nods, Arohk, Sarah, and Fay all grab at the large steel door and lift, little by little the door starts to raise, they lifted it about four feet in the air before Sarah starts waving for everyone to go under. You had to crouch down and do a mini summersault under, as soon as every one was under, Ramona, Mira, and Matilda grabbed the door so Sarah, Arohk, and Fay could slide under. Once they were under they slowly set the door back down as not to alert anyone that might be near by, "ok this part might be better suited for you" says Sarah, pointing at you, Arohk and Fay boost you up to the trap door that you fell down the previous day, you manage to get your fingers in between the two halves of the door and pry open the door, they set you down and Fay boosts Sarah up followed by Arohk, Matilda, Mira and finally Ramona, they turned around and pulled up Fay. You stood there waiting for them to pull you up, but nothing happened, "they didn't just leave me did they?" you think.

After waiting ten minutes............
144121111.title: The next morning: the great escape

1441211111.content:
You walk around the room waiting, the whole time you were think, "they wouldn't leave me, I helped them......but then again what Ramona said....", suddenly you feel something furry wrap around you waist and pull you up through the trapdoor, you look and see it was one of Arohk's tails. Once you get to the top you see Sarah looking at you, "we couldn't just leave our favorite chew toy behind now could we" she says with a grin, "sorry there was a guard, but he's been taken care of" she adds.

You look over and see Fay sitting on the floor purring, rubbing her huge gut that twitched every few seconds, next to her was a pile of shredded clothes, "normally I'd be against this, but these people threw me away like I was trash so to hell with them" you say looking back at Sarah.

The five of you continued down the hall to scout ahead while Matilda helped Fay. Eventually you come to a split in the hallway, , "ok Mira and Ramona go left, Arohk and I will go right" says Sarah, "what about me?" you ask. "You will........
1441211111.title: They pull you up

choices: Take the risk and go to them
Head off on your own way
1441211112.content:
You hear the cell door above open and then nothing, you sit there waiting for them to help you out of the hole, "umm guys?" you shout, no response.Suddenly you hear the sounds of gunshots and fighting off in the distance, after a while, the noises die down and then nothing, but silence. "They used me and left me" you say to yourself, as you sit on the ground, even without trying you knew the trapdoor was too high for you to pull yourself out. you sigh and look around the room, suddenly you spot an air vent that you failed to notice before, you make your way over and give it a good pull, nothing. You step back and give it a good kick, still nothing, you keep kicking at it, finally it gives, the duct was just wide enough for you to crawl through.

You follow the duct for what feels like hours of crawling, climbing and avoiding fans, finally you reach another vent, you climb out and find yourself in some sort of armory or supply room. Instantly you spot your confiscated weapons and gear on a bench, you re-don everything and make your way into the hallway, the first thing that you saw were the bullet holes and spent shell casings, as you moved sown the hall you say discarded weapons and then torn clothing, things that you've seen that usually are associated with an anthro attack.

You eventually enter what looks like a makeshift command center, everything was trashed, more clothing and shell casings littered the floor, you spot a piece of paper on a table, this interest you because it was the only piece of paper in the whole room. You pick up the paper and see it was addressed to you:

"If you are reading this we're sorry for leaving you down there, but the risk was too great for you to stay with us. If you still want to take the risk and stay with us then you have to figure out where we are, we have faith that if you figured out how to get out of that hole, then you should be able to figure out where we went and where you can find us"

At the bottom of the note in place of the person's signature there were six different paw prints. You turn the paper over and on the back was a set of numbers, they weren't latitude and longitude numbers and they weren't military grid coordinates, "what could these be?" you think to yourself., You spot a book on the table next to the note, when you open the book you see it was a book about supply depots in the United Stated, "odd.....hang on" you say, you look at the numbers and then the book and thats when it hits you. The first number a page number and the second one took you to a paragraph and the third one took you to a picture, soon you come up with the directions to a medium warehouse/ surplus store. You pull out a map and locate where you were and where the store is, it was about a day's travel................
1441211112.title: Nothing

14412111121.content:
You decide to take the risk and follow after them because they are the first group of people that you met that seem to care about you, everyone else that you've met in the past just wants you for your supplies. You head back to the armory/supply room and start packing up as much food, water and ammo that you could carry before heading out, when you get outside you gather your bearings and head off in the direction of the building where Sarah, Arohk, Matilda, Mira, Fay, and Ramona should be, most likely wait to see if you would come after them.

You manage to find a car that had half a tank of gas in it which manage to shorted your travel time in half. By the time you reach the warehouse/ surplus store it was dark out, the front of the building looked normal with the exception of the broken lock on the door, carefully you enter the store. Inside all the lights were off so you reach into your bag and don a set of night vision goggles that you acquired from the armory. You move through the aisles with your weapon raised, searching for any signs of your new found friends, suddenly you spot some light coming from what looked like the camping gear section of the store. You make your way towards the light as you turn the corner you see.........
14412111121.title: Take the risk and go to them

choices: There's someone else in the building
144121111212.content:
You remove your NVGs and turn the corner with your weapon raised, expecting the worst, but instead you saw all six girls sitting on the floor around an electric camping heater. As soon as you turned the corner they looked up and saw you, in unison they stood up "CHEW TOY!!" they yelled in excitement before tackling you, for a good ten minutes you were showered with kisses and licks from all six girls before you get them to finally stop.

"We're sorry we left you behind, we were afraid that when we broke out we would lose control and accidentally go after you" says Sarah as she laid her head on your chest. "Its ok, hey I got out didn't I?" you say giving her a small pat on the head which elicited a purr from her. "You did and you solved my little puzzle" says Arohk, not lifting her head from your right breast.

"How about making it a little challenging next time" you joke, she playfully bats you in the face with her tail.

Suddenly you hear a loud growl, "what was that?" you ask, all six girls start giggling, "that was us, we were just about to have dinner, care to join us?" says Fay. You nod, you were starting to feel hungry too, they climb off you and move back over to the heater, you strip off your gear and set it behind you, "so what's dinner?" you ask, rubbing you hands near the heater...........
144121111212.title: The girls

1441211112122.content:
"Just some food courtesy of the meat section, its a good thing the power still works here" says Mira, Fay gets up and pulls out an electric cooking grill and some packs of meat from behind a tent, before you knew it you here cooking a pack of hot dogs and some hamburgers. Ramona inspected a hotdog closely, "they don't really put dog in these do they?" she asks, you burst out in a fit of laughter that you almost choked on your food, after calming down you look at her in a serious face, "only the ones that ask too many questions" you say with a straight face.

Ramona dropped the hotdog in shock, but your laughter gave the joke away, "thats it, you're mine chew toy" she says as she tackles you, "wait wait...were did the name 'chew toy' come from" you ask, "its just a nickname we came up for you, because of how you feed yourself to us" says Arohk, you sit there thinking about your new nickname, Sarah sees the look on your face, "don't think of it as an insult, but more of a term of endearment" she says.

The rest of dinner went fairly well, you stopped eating after two hot dogs and a hamburger, but the girls kept begging you to make more, pretty soon you were down to the last of each, "last ones guys" you say as you cook the last of the hamburgers and hotdogs, "aww just one more....pretty please" begged Matilda, "no I mean thats it, there are no more" you say holding up the empty bags, the girls groan, "aww....I guess all good things must come to an end sometime" moans Fay, rubbing her slightly distended stomach, you look around all six had the same beer belly look from all the food they ate.

Soon everything was cleaned up and the girls started lounging around, mainly on you, one by one, they drifted off to sleep. Fay, Matilda, and Sarah started purring in their sleep, while Ramona and Mira simply draped themselves across your legs and Arohk laid on top of you, wrapping her tails around your chest and waist before falling asleep. You look around at the six fur that were asleep on you, you thought back to what Ramona said to you in the compound, "maybe not all humans are bad" her words echo in you head. "Maybe not all Furries are bad too" you say to yourself, before you drift off to sleep.............
1441211112122.title: Normal food

choices: The fox make you do something
14412111121222.content:
You wake up for no apparent reason, you look around, Arohk had let go of you sometime during the night and managed to get tangled up with Ramona. It looked like she was comforting Ramona in her sleep, then it dawns on you whey you woke up: bathroom. You grab your sidearm and a flashlight before extracting your legs out from under Mira and Sarah, Fay rolled over and made a grab for you in her sleep, but instead she snagged Arohk's legs. You chuckle to yourself as you carefully navigate the maze of bodies in search of a restroom.

Finally you locate an employee bathroom and relieve yourself, as you open the door to leave you see Mira standing in the doorway, "jeez!...Mira you scared the crap out of me" you say. The husky gave you a small smile, "but I thought you just finished going" she says, pointing to the stall, "oh ha ha....anyways do you need something?" you ask, "yeah I need to go too" she says, thats when you saw she was doing a small bathroom dance. You apologize and quickly leave, but as you return to the others yo hear the sound of glass clinking together, at first you thought it was one of the girls, but a quick head count proved that theory wrong.

You draw your handgun and make your way toward the noise, you make your way into the food section of the store, again you hear the sound of clinking glass and grunting. You turn the corner with your flashlight and pistol raised and to your surprise, siting on the floor was a female fox with her back to you. She either didn't notice your flashlight or didn't care, as you neared her you saw she had something in her hands, as you look around her you see she had taken a jar of strawberry jam and it was giving her a hard time. "Hello?" you say with a cautious, but authoritative voice, the fox froze and slowly turned around, jar in her jaws, slowly she set the jar down and got to her feet, she didn't do or say anything, except stare at you, suddenly you feel yourself loose control of your body.

The fox let out a cute laugh, "why don't you put that gun down" she says in an almost seductive voice, suddenly you find yourself setting your pistol on the ground and there was nothing you could do. It was if the fox in control of everything, but your thoughts, she made a curling motion with her finger, suddenly you found yourself walking towards the fox, you fight to stop your body from walking, but it wasn't working, "its no use, you might as well stop resisting" she said................
14412111121222.title: There's someone sneaking around

choices: Give her some food and let her go
144121111212222.content:
All of a sudden, Mira came running from behind you and tackled the fox, breaking whatever hold she had on you, quickly you scoop up your pistol and run to Mira. Mira had the fox pinned to the ground, to your surprise the fox was crying, "I'm sorry! I'm sorry! please don't hurt me I didn't know! I was just looking for food!" she bawled, tear streaming out of her eyes, "well you're not going to make food out my little chew toy" growls Mira, "I wasn't going to eat him, just use him to help get me food thats all I swear!!" cries the fox, the sound of footsteps draws your attention, apparently the mini brawl had stirred the rest of the girls.

Sarah walks over you, "what happened" you retell her everything, how you heard a noise and found the fox and how she put you in a trance. Sarah walks over to the fox, "If we release you are you going to be good for a second?" she asks the fox, the fox stopped crying long enough to nod, Mira carefully gets off the fox, who sits up and hugs her knees to her chest with her tail wrapping around her body, tears still flowing out of her eyes.

"What do we do with her?" Mira asks in a low whisper, "I think she's telling the truth and that she's just hungry and looking for food" you say, Mira shoots you a look, "did you miss the part where she hypnotized you and almost made you her little snack?" says Mira, "well when I first found her, she was trying to open a jar of jelly, but she couldn't figure it out, so I think she was going to use me to open it" you say, "but she could have just asked you to" argued Mira.

"Ok put yourself in her place, if you just encounter what could be your first human, are you just going to ask him or her for help?" you ask, Mira opens her mouth to say something, but stops, "ok, but the question is still there, what do we do with her?" says Sarah.................
144121111212222.title: Mira to the rescue

1441211112122222.content:
"I think she should stay with us" you say, Mira looked at you shocked, "why?!" I think we should just give her some food and send her on her way" says Mira, "Mira......" said Sarah, in a mother-like tone, "there is plenty of space and food for our guest to stay with us" she added. Mira opened her mouth to argue again, but Sarah cut her off, "remember you were like that when I found you.....and I took you in didn't I?" she says, Mira looks over at the fox, who stopped crying and was just sitting on the floor quietly waiting. Mira looked back at Sarah, to your surprise you saw tears in her eyes, "you're right....I wasn't thinking clearly, I think she should stay too" she say in a sad voice, Sarah grabbed her and hugged her tightly, "so its settled, you mystery guest is staying" she says.

You pick up the jar of strawberry jam and walk over to the fox, as you neared her she flinched and covered her face with her tail, "I'm sorry, please don't hurt me!" she said through her tail, you twist on the lid to open the jam, but it gave you trouble too, "Now I see why you had a problem opening this" you say to the fox, finally you manage to get the lid off and when you did, the fox peek out from her tail, you hold out the open jar. She cautiously leans over and sniffs the jar, before slowly taking it from you and dipping her tongue in the jam, she gives you a small smile, Mira walks over and kneels next you, but that fox disappeared back under her tail, "please don-" the fox started, but Mira stopped her, "I won't hurt you, now could you please stop hiding so we can talk" Mira says in a calm voice.

Slowly the fox lowered her tail, you and Mira explain your offer to her, you notice that as you explained that you were willing to let her stay, she seemed to calm down and open up more. After you finished you offer, the fox reached over and hugged both of you, "of course I want to stay, I will do anything to help, I'll cook, clean whatever you need" she says with tears of joy rolling down her face, "Ok well first things first, lets get you some food" you say, helping the fox to her feet, you take her back to your resting area and get her some decent food besides jelly. After a while you do introductions and find out her name is Rena, soon she was tired so the eight of you decide to go to sleep, Rena decided she wanted to sleep next to you, before you knew in, you where buried again under many pounds of fur and flesh.

Just before you drift off to sleep again, each girls gave you a kiss on the forehead, including Rena..........
1441211112122222.title: Have her stay

14412111121222221.content:
You open your eyes and see the overhead lights were on, you look around and see Sarah laying on your chest, everyone one else was gone. You see Sarah's eyes were closed, but you knew she was awake, you reach over and start petting her head causing her to start purring, "good morning Sarah" you say as she opens her eyes and smiles at you, "good morning chewy, we decide that you needed the extra rest so we let you sleep, would you like breakfast?" she asks, climbing off you.

You sit up and Sarah hands you a serving of food, "where is everyone?" you ask, "looking for clothes, we can't always run around like this" she says, gesturing to her nude body. This never bothered you because even though they weren't wearing clothes, they were still 'clothed' in their fur, as if on command the rest of the girls come back wearing clothing that they picked out.

You look at their clothes and see..........................
14412111121222221.title: The next morning

144121111212222212.content:
The rest of the girls were wearing normal clothes that any human girl would wear. They all smiled when they saw you up, and Rena walked over and snuggled up to you. 'It's great that she is getting used to us.' You thought to yourself.

Suddenly their was a loud crash and everyone looked around for the source. Then out of the corner of your eye you spotted someone running away. "THERE!!" You shout and Sarah jumped up and ran as fast as she could to catch the person.

The rest of you followed her to find out who the person was. Then you hear a loud scream. 'That sounded like a young boys scream.' You thought. Then you find Sarah on the ground pinning someone under her. You look and see that you were right about them being a young boy. He looked roughly 15, maybe 16 years old, and he was scared.

"Please don't kill me! I-I-I don't want any trouble! I was just looking for food!" He was on the verge of tears. You walked over to him and look him in the eyes. He was scared shitless. You walked away called for Sarah to come over too. She slowly got up and still held the boy in place.

"Watch him." Sarah said to the others. She walked over to you. "So, what do you think we should do with him?" "I think he is telling the truth about looking for food, but if that's true then he must be alone, which also means that he must have been separated from his family or something along the lines of that."

Sarah looked you then the boy he was acting just like how Rena was last night when she was caught. "So you think he should stay?" "Yeah, unless you think he shouldn't." She thought for a moment and then looked at you. "OK he can stay, but first we should ask him some questions." "Agreed."

The two of you walked over to the boy and he backed up only to run into a wall. He started to panic so you reassured him. "Don't worry we just to ask you a few questions." He looked at you in fear. "What k-k-kind of questions?" He asked. "Simple ones like what's your name and where are your parents or any family member, because let's face it you probably had some family member around, am I right?" Said Sarah. He looked at her and his eyes started to water. "My mom and Dad are dead..." He said softly. He began to cry softly and said something else. "Your kind killed them about a week ago...and...and...I...I've..." He began to fully cry and Sarah felt really bad for unintentionally bring this up.

You and everyone else looked at the boy with sympathy. He had his parents taken from him, and he had been alone for the past week and had possible been morning his loss. "I'm sorry I didn't know." Sarah said. She suddenly walked over and hugged the boy. "It's ok your safe now. I promise that nothing will happen to you, If you stay with us we will be able to protect you." She said and the boy continued to cry. After a few minutes the stopped crying and looked Sarah in the eyes. "Thank you...I needed that..." He said as he wiped a tear from his eye. "So will you stay?" Sarah asked, and almost instantly the boy answered. "Yes I'll stay...As long as I don't get tackled again...That hurt." Sarah laughed a little. "I promise you won't get tacked again." Sarah said and the boy hugged her again.

A few hours later everyone was relaxing and just talking. You found out more about the boy too. His name was Michael. He was from Canada, but once everything went to hell he came to the U.S. in hopes of a better chance at survival. He soon found that survival here was harder, due to more Anthros and bandits, but he learned how to survive quickly. He had to, if he wanted to live.

Once Michael was comfortable around everyone he opened up quite a bit. Soon everyone was talking and laughing, just having a good time. It almost felt like everything was normal. It was almost as if the world was as it was before. It was the first time that any of them had peace in a long time.
144121111212222212.title: A new member

1443.content:
You lay on the ground in pain as you listen to the sounds of someone running toward you, you look over and see you rifle on the ground next to you. As you grab for it you hear a voice, "holy shit man are you ok?", you look over and see a male dressed in faded cargo pants and a slightly torn shirt running toward you. Behind him you saw five other humans all armed with an assortment of weapons, you noticed a female with a high caliber sniper rifle slung over her shoulder, " I'm sorry I thought that you were one of them" she says lowering her head.
