"Hey buddy are you ok?" the first male asked again, "I'll be ok" you say as you get to your feet. "My name is Johnny," says the male, "this is Amber" he says pointing to the female with the sniper rifle, "and that is Anthony, Henry, Zak, and Sasha" says Johnny pointing the the other four members of the group. "Christopher" you say holding out your hand for shaking, all of you talk about what happened and apologize are exchanged .

"Hey you can come with us if you want" says Zak, "where are you guys headed?" you ask, "well our plan was to head to the near by National Guard base and get some wheels and then head into Detroit, there''s supposedly refuge there" he says. "Sure you'll need help piloting any military vehicles we find" you say, "alright then we should get moving while there's still light out" says Anthony. The seven of you head out towards the base that Zak was talking about, after about four hours of walking you come across what was left of the base, all the fencing around the base was trampled and bent, just about every door on all the buildings was either broken down or torn up with claw marks. Every now and then you would find the charred remains of vehicles or discarded weapons, every where you looked you saw spent shell casings littering the ground. "I think its safe to say that we are the only ones here" says Henry, "at least the only humans here, remember those anthro creatures could still be here" says Sasha. "Alright lets find some transport and get out of here" says Johnny, the group heads toward the motor pool or rather what was left of it, most the the vehicles were missing, most likely used during the evacuation of the nearby cities, but a few of the Humvees were just broken, charred hulls, there were however three untouched, but one had flat tires and would be no good.

"Come on lets take these two" said Henry, "they won't do, their range is too small and they aren't armored" you say. "why do they need to be armored?" Henry asks, "because I've seen those anthros rip off the doors and pull out the occupants" you tell him. "Hey what about this?" says Amber you look at what she was pointing at, at the end of the motor pool sat a lone eight wheeled armored Stryker, "that'll do" you say. After a quick inspection you find that it only needed to be filled up and it was good to go, "try to find any gas can and fill them up too, I don't want to stop any more than we need to" says Johnny. You, Sasha, Zak, and Anthony head off into the main building to locate any gas cans, food, or weapons to take with you, the four of you come to a split in the hallway, "ok if my time in the military has taught me anything, its that most bases are the same, so weapons and ammo should be this way and food, water should be that way" you say. "I hate to say it, but we need to split up if we want to do this quickly" says Sasha, "ok then you two get the weapons and any ammo while Anthony and I get food and water" says Zak.

You and Sasha leave and head towards where you think the armory is, surprisingly the lights still worked inside which you liked, because the only think you hated more than dark corridors were dark corridors with anthros in them. As you walked down the hallway you saw more spent shells casings over the floor, broken glass and foot prints in what you assumed was dried blood, both human and animal. Sasha peeked in a random room, suddenly both your noses were assaulted with a horrid smell, "oh god!" Sasha said putting her hand up to her mouth and nose. You didn't need to look in to know that some anthros had turned the closet into their personal bathroom, "come on lets go" you say grabbing her arm and dragging her away from the closet. Soon the two of you locate the armory and start filling up on any ammo that you could use, you made sure to grab some .50 cal ammo for the Stryker's M2, you locate a new ceramic chest plate so you replace your's with that one, "alright lets get out of here, we've been in here longer than I like to" says Sasha, you nod and grab the duffle bags that you filled with ammo, weapons and some body armor and leave........
1443.title: A group of survivors

14431.content:
As you and Sasha walk back outside you see Anthony and Zak already loading up the Stryker with whatever food supplies they found, "glad to see you guys made off better than us" says Anthony. "What'd you get" you ask, "maybe three days worth of food and six days worth of water" says Zak, you climb up n the Stryker and load a can of ammo into the M2 that was mounted on the roof. Just as you close the feed cover on the M2 you hear a noise, you look up and see a group of three anthros walking toward the base perimeter, "uh guys get in and seal the rear hatch" you say, "why?" asks Johnny, you point the the anthros that seemed to now notice you and were moving at a fast pace towards you, "alright people move it" he says. As soon as the last person was in the rear hatch raised and locked in place, you open up the hatch over the driver seat and jumped in, locking the hatch behind you just as the first anthro jumped towards you.

You look over and see the others looking outward as the anthros start pounding on the hull, "don't worry 14mm of armor will keep them out" you say as you start the engine and drive off leaving the anthros behind. You instruct Zak on how to use the navigation system and how to use the C.R.O.W.S mounted M2 incase you run into any trouble, every so often you had to crash through wrecked cars blocking the way, "hey try no to hit all the car will ya" joked Henry. "Would you like to drive instead?" you say, "no looks too complicated for me" he says, "so Johnny what kind of refuge is this that we're going to?" you ask........
14431.title: Off to Detroit

144312.content:
"The place we're going to is a refuge for humans and anthros" says Johnny, after hearing this you suddenly slam on the brakes, causing all eight tires to lock up. "I think I crashed into one too many cars and gave myself a head injury, because I think I just heard you say that this place houses humans and anthros" you say spinning in your seat to look at Johnny. "No you heard correct" he says, "you do realize anthros are the cause of this little apocalypse we're in right?" you say. " not these anthros, when this whole things first started they wanted to make piece with us, but the other anthros threw a wrench in the works before piece could be made" says Johnny. "Listen you don't have to stay with us, but can you please just drop us off there?" begs Sasha, you look at her and see she was staring at you, you look over her shoulder and see everyone else was also giving you the same stare, you let out a sigh, "I must be nuts" you think, "alright" you say as you resume driving.

After driving on the road for a little over three days you finally come into view of Detroit, but it was dark out and raining heavily making it difficult to see far into the city. After entering the city Amber directs you to a large abandoned hotel, "how do you know where this place was?" you ask as you park out front, Amber looks away momentarily "I've ben here before" she say, you give her a look of suspicion, "its not what you think" she says. "Are we there?" Zak yawns from the back of the Stryker, Johnny looks out one of the viewports on the side and smiled, "come on let's head in" he says. "Hold on, how can you be sure that these humans and anthros are still here?" you ask, he sighs, "good point, I'll go check" he says, "I'll go too" says Anthony, "aw hell I'll go too, this human anthro thing is something I need to see to believe" you say getting up from the driver seat. "Ok then Zak you man the gun and keep the hatches locked until we return" you say, "but I can't see in the dark with this thing" he says pointing to the screen, you reach over and turn on the FLIR, "oh" he says.

You grab your helmet, vest, rifle, and head out into the pouring rain with Johnny and Anthony in tow. Quickly the three of you sprint to the hotel door and head in, you hear the sound of the Stryker's rear hatch click and lock shut as you enter the hotel. "Ok Johnny were to now?" you ask, shining your flashlight around the dark hallway, "second floor, that's where she said to meet her when I returned" he says, "she?" you say, "yeah, her name is Kikio, she's a Kitsune" he says. You give him a confused look, "you know, a nine tailed fox" he says holding up nine fingers, " doesn't matter, lets just go met this Kikio" you say. The three of you reach the second floor which was just another dark corridor, "really hate these" you think to yourself as you shine you light over every nook and cranny in the hallway. The one thing that bugged you the most was the large hole in the ceiling, upon closer inspection you saw it lead into what you assumed were ventilation ducts. "Hmm she said she would meet me here" says Johnny, "do you think she doesn't yet know you're here?" says Anthony, he shakes his head, "no Kikio told me she definitely would know when I was here" he says. Suddenly you feel something wrap itself around you and drag you up toward the hole in the ceiling, causing you to drop your rifle. You manage to grasp onto the edge of the hole and stop yourself from being dragged away, "hold on" yelled Anthony, "you better move quick" you shout as the metal edges of the duct start to bend. "No no no no no n-Hmph!" suddenly you get silenced as something furry wrapped around your face and pulled down the ventilation shaft, you are dragged for what feels like miles through the ducts before coming to a stop face to face with a set of glowing emerald eyes. As you stared into the eyes you saw......
144312.title: "Human/Anthro refuge"

1443123.content:
As you lay there, restrained, you can only watch as the glowing eyes scrutinize you, suddenly they change as the owner of the eyes seems to recognize you. "Its you again" says a smooth female voice, you couldn't respond because what you assume to be a tail was still wrapped over your face. "My apologies" says the figure as your mouth is freed, "who the hell are you?!" you almost scream, "relax and the memory will come to you" says the figure. "Who was this person? Dragging me through vent ducts and asking me to calm down!?!?" you think to yourself, you wrestle against whatever had you restrained, "let me go!' you yell in anger, suddenly you no longer feel angry or upset, but only slightly afraid, "what did you just do to me!" you demand. "I calmed you down by removing your anger and hate for now, so that I may release you" said the figure, you feel whatever was wrapped around your chest and arms unwind, "come follow me" says the voice, "I can't friggin see" you say as the eyes disappear in the darkness.

Suddenly you feel something warm and soft wrap around your wrist and lightly pull forward, you resist, "its ok you can trust me" says the female from somewhere in front of you. You reluctantly give in and allow yourself to be directed though the dark, eventually you come to a stop, "your friends are in the other room looking for you," says the figure, you reach out and feel some type of door in front of you, you locate the door knob and open the door only to have a blinding light shined in your face, "holy crap, he's alive" said a voice that your recognize as Anthony's. "And he found Kikio" says Johnny, you turn around and see that the light revealed a Kitsune standing in the door with a faded and slightly torn kimono on. Out of habit you check her out, even though she stood like a human her feet were more canine than human, beneath the kimono she boasted a bust that would make most female jealous, flowing behind her you saw nine furry tails that seemed inviting, and her face had a certain type of beauty to it, almost made you feel bad for yelling at her. She turned to Johnny, "is this all?" she asked, "no there are four more waiting in a vehicle outside" he says, "well bring them in out of the rain and get them a decent place to sleep tonight" Kikio says.

"I'd better go, Zak might accidentally shoot at you if he sees you" you say to Kikio, she nods understandingly. "Here you dropped this earlier" says Anthony as he hands you your rifle, you head back outside in the rain and wave to the Stryker, you hear the rear hatch unlock and lower, "is it safe?" you hear Sasha ask, "yeah" you answer. The other four come out of the Stryker and run inside out of the rain, standing in what used to be the main lobby of the hotel was Kikio, Johnny, another human, and a female anthro rabbit. "My name is Kikio and this is Aaron and that is Maddy" says Kikio, gesturing to the other human and the rabbit. The rabbit stepped forward, "I will take you to your rooms, if you don't feel comfortable around me I understand and Aaron will show you to your rooms instead" says Maddy. Soon the group moved off following the rabbit girl up the stairs, leaving you, Kikio, and Johnny alone, Johnny turns to you, "still want to leave?" he asks, "oh at least stay the night, don't go out in this rain" begs Kikio, you let out a long sigh, "alright I'll stay for the night, who knows maybe I will change my mind" you say. "Excellent where would you like to stay?" she asks....
1443123.title: Recognition???

14431231.content:
"I think I--" before you could finish you feel your broken rib shift, causing you extreme pain, you collapse to one knee, Kikio and Johnny run over to you, "whats wrong?" Kikio asks with a concerned voice, 'my rib" you say through gritted teeth, Kikio looks at you confused. Johnny explains to Kikio how your rib became broken, how Amber had mistaken you for a hostile fur, "well if he's injured he's staying with me" she says. "No I'm fine I've had worse" you tell her, "nonsense, you are staying with me until its healed, end of story" she says, helping you to your feet and directing you to a set of stairs, the two of you climb the stairs to the second floor, but it didn't look the same, for starters the hole in the ceiling was gone and the whole hallway looked clean and well kept.

"What the?" you say noticing the change, "I'll explain later," says Kikio as she walks you towards a room, inside, the hotel room looked more like a small apartment complete with a kitchen, bathroom, and living room/bedroom combo. She set you down on the large bed and proceeded to carefully remove your shirt and vest, "what are you doing?" you ask, "I need to get a better look at your injuries" she says as she pulls off your shirt. Having someone of her species starting to undress you unnerved you, you flinch at her touch and are hesitant with her removing your vest and weapons, "whats wrong?" she asks at your fidgeting. "I'm sorry I'm just not used to--" "someone like me?" she says, finishing your sentence, you nod, she gets up and turns off the lights, the room was dark except for the small amount of moonlight that came in through the window, "is that better?" she asks. All you could see of Kikio was her glowing emerald eyes in the dark, "a little" you say, suddenly you feel something thrown at you, you hold it up in the moonlight and see it was her kimono.

"What are you doing?" you ask, "well I figured if I was seeing you without a shirt, it might make you feel better if I didn't have one on either" she says walking over to you, the moonlight shining on her, revealing that she no longer was wearing her kimono. She ran her fox-like hands over your injured rib, "well I have bad news and good news, the bad news is you have three broken ribs and two cracked" she says. "Well whats the good news?" you ask, "I can heal your ribs, but its going to take a couple of days of bed rest" she says. You nod, she places a hand on your ribs and closes her eyes, you feel the area around your injuries go numb, but you could feel the broken ribs shift as they were moved back into place, "how is she doing this?" you think to yourself as the last bone was reset into its proper place.

Kikio open her eyes, her breathing sounded like she just ran a marathon, "it must take a lot of energy to do that" you think to yourself. Kikio crawls into the bed and lays next to you, soon she was asleep, snoring lightly, her tails swishing slowly over the bed. For you this was a new experience, sleeping next to a nude, nine tailed fox, in a hotel filled with more of these furry creatures and humans. You attempt to relax your mind and try to fall asleep, just before you drift off you feel one of Kikio's tails wrap itself around you waist and pulling you closer to her body. You were too tired to release yourself so you just roll over and fall asleep......
14431231.title: "Um...with you"

144312311.content:
As you open your eyes you see sunlight streaming in through nearby window, as you look around the room your see Kikio was nowhere to be seen. You sit up in the bed, rubbing your face, "that was an odd night" you say to yourself, just as you swing your feet over the edge of the bed, the door opened and in walked Kikio with a tray of food, "where do you think you're going?" she asked. "Umm...out?" you say, "nope you're bedridden for a couple days remember, bathroom only" she says, "in that case I need to use the bathroom" you say, getting up to relive yourself. As you walk out of the bathroom you see Kikio sitting on the foot of the bed with the tray next to her, "I thought you could use some breakfast" she says gesturing to the tray. You sit on the bed and start eating some of the food, it was a huge change compared to the rations you've been eating, "so some of our other guests wanted to know if they could stop by and check on you" says Kikio. "What other guests?" you ask, "well there are about ten other humans here besides you and there are about fifteen other anthros like me here and some of the anthros what to see you if it ok to visit you" she says.

"Oh....sure, how many want to see me?" you ask, Kikio smiles and walks over to the door and opens it, standing out in the hallway are at least ten anthros, most were female. All the females were staring at you, giggling amongst themselves, a few waved to you, which you returned. You could see three of the anthros were males, a wolf, some type of lizard and a black panther were standing behind the females. Kikio gestured for them to enter, to your surprise you saw a couple anthros that you've never seen before, like one of the female was a shark and another female was a mix of a husky and a fox. Surprisingly all of them fit in to the room comfortably without any one bumping arms and stepping on tails, a couple of the females gathered around the floor near your feet, you look at Kikio with a concerned face, "do you do this with every new person that stays here?" you ask, "sometimes, but not all the time" she says.

Kikio looks at the group, "who wants to go first?" she asks, almost instantly every hand...err..paw shot up in the air, you look around and point to.............
144312311.title: The next morning

144312312.content: now is she hungry for food or lust?
144312312.title: Kikio's suddenly hungry

1443123121.content:
At some point in the middle of the night you are awoken to something shifting in the bed, as you try to go back to sleep you hear whispering, very slowly you open your eyes and see Kikio sitting up and looking at your hip area, whispering to herself. With your eyes adjusted to the dark you can see shes rubbing her paws and then slowly reaches out to your crotch area, stopping herself a few inches short "no....i shouldn't, he doesn't even remember me, but....mmmmm this is difficult" you hear her whispering to herself. "Whats difficult?" you say, finally breaking the silence and scaring the hell out of Kikio "OH!!! n-nothing" she exclaims, but you knew that was a lie and stared at her "you saw some of that didn't you?" she finally caves, making you nod. "I'm sorry, i didn't mean to wake you up, if you must know, I'm sort of how you say, 'in need of release' i think is the best way" she says, clearly embarrassed, rubbing her paws and looking down. "What was that other part about me not knowing you?" you add, hearing this she freezes and was clearly bothered by that question, "w-well you see, if you remember back in the duct i said 'its you again' well, we've met before.....in fact, no never mind" she says, looking down and away from you. Carefully you sit up and move towards her, she turns away from you and hides her face,embarrassed, "what is it?" you ask, gently setting a hand on her furry shoulder, slowly she looks back at you and looks you right in the eyes "well.....we are together, i found you about a two months ago, all hurt and dirtied up and i rescued you, took you in and nursed you back to health, and well...heh, i fell in love with you and you did too, we looked out for each other and such" she says, getting all teary eyed as she spoke, placing a paw on your hand.

Hearing this you look at her shocked, searching your memory, trying to find any trace of Kikio, but not remembering a thing "why cant i remember you at all, i want to so bad, but i cant" you say, upset at yourself, Kikio moves closer to you and puts her paw on your shoulder now "i don't know, all i know is you went out for supplies one day and never returned, i searched for you everywhere and just when i was beginning to give up, i found you again" she says, giving you a happy smile, which quickly disappeared "but it seems you haven't found me again" she says, looking at you sad like.......
1443123121.title: lust hunger

14431231211.content:
You stopped and looked at her, looking at her soft fur, her fluffy and warm tails, and then remembering her figure, how beautiful she looked when you first saw her, blushing a bit and thinking to yourself if you should...."Kikio, while i might not have found you, would someone as beautiful as yourself be willing to help me search?" you say to her, smiling warmly and holding out your hand to her. She stopped and you hear her make a small gasp, looking at you with tears in her eye as she slowly smiled and accepted your hand "of course i will" she murred, moving closer to you, holding your hand close to her chest, nervously making a move to kiss you, "Im really gonna do this" you say to yourself as Kikio's soft lips pressed against yours, shocked at how human like this was, kissing a furry like her. Very slowly she straddled your waist and wrapped her arms around your head, pressing her large bust against your bare chest, as you close your eyes you feel her soft and inviting tails wrap around the two of you, holding you in a tight and warm embrace, gingerly you put your hands on her hips, running your fingers through her soft fur, hearing her murr happily in the kiss as you do that. For what feels like an eternity, the two of you stay like that, human and Kitsune, interlocked in an embrace before finally breaking off and looking at her, smiling as you starting to feel something towards her, "Kikio... I think I'm starting to realize why i fell in love with you in the first place" hearing this put a big smile on her face.

"Well if you think thats good, i can always to better" she says, smiling seductivly, moving closer and whispering in your ear something that makes you blush a bit and start to get you worked up enough that she felt your growing arousal through your pants. "I'm sensing that it worked" she says with a grin.............
14431231211.title: Giver her another try

choices: "Do you remember when you met me?"
14431232.content:
"I think I'll sleep in the Stryker for the night, I'm not quite comfortable staying in the same building with so many anthros right now" you say. Kikio nods, "understandable, let me go get you something to sleep with at least" she says, you look out at the Stryker, "thank you but that won't be---" as you turn around you saw Kikio had disappeared leaving Johnny standing there with his arms crossed, "where'd she go?" you ask Johnny. He turns to where Kikio was and drops his arms, "she was here a second ago, I didn't hear her leave" he says spinning around the room looking for her. You suddenly feel a tap on your shoulder making you jump, you turn and see Kikio standing there with a pillow and blanket tucked under her arm, "sorry I didn't mean to scare you" she says. You take the pillow and blanket, say your goodnights and run out into the rain to the Stryker, you get in and seal the ramp behind you, making sure it and all the other hatches were locked tight so no anthros could sneak in during the night. You set you gear down in a fashion so if someone tried to get in you could defend yourself, you lay out the pillow and blanket and after making sure everything was turned off, laid down and drifted off to sleep to the sound of the rain hitting the Stryker's hull.

You find yourself face to face with a set of glowing green eyes, you struggle to get free of whatever had your arms pinned to your sides, "let me go!' you bellow at the eyes. You see a set of glowing white teeth form in an evil smile beneath the eyes, "I don't think so lunch" a voice said in an evil tone, suddenly the teeth open and lunge forward as you scream. You jolt awake from your nightmare so fast that you smack your head on one of the benches in the Stryker. "Ow...son of a..." you whisper as you sit up rubbing your forehead, you look at your watch's glowing hands, "wow only been asleep for an hour and the nightmares are already starting" you whisper. Just then you hear the sound of the ramp unlocking and start to lower, you reach over and grab you sidearm and take aim as the ramp dropped on its own accord. As the ramp settled on the ground you saw a figure standing there with glowing emerald eyes, "damn it Kikio, I just want you to know I almost shot you" you say, "mmm no you wouldn't have" she says as she walks up the ramp and out of the rain. "Come to convince me to stay?" you ask as the ramp raises up and re-locks, "no just to talk" she says, you try to read her face, but it was too dark in the Stryker and the only source of light was from the FLIR monitor which only illuminated the front half of the interior so all you could see was Kikio's glowing eyes in the dark staring at you. "And I brought you something hot to drink" she say, "what is it?" you ask, "what you humans call coffee, I think I finally figured how to make it" she says, you turn on one of the electric camping lanterns that you acquired during your travels, sitting on the set of benched to your right was Kikio in her drenched kimono, "here take my jacket and lets hang that up to dry" you say as you remove you jacket and hand it to her.

Kikio gives you a small smile and accepts the jacket, you avert your gaze so she could remove the kimono and put on the jacket, you feel Kikio slide under the covers next you. "Sorry I don't exactly wear pants under that kimono" she says as you hang up the drenched clothing, "but you're at least wearing underwear right?" you say, "oh of course, I may be an animal, but I'm still civilized" she says making you chuckle, "what does wearing underwear have to do with being civilized?" you ask, "actually on second thought don't answer that" you add. You sit back down as Kikio was pouring you a cup of coffee from the thermos she brought with her, "so what did you want to talk about?" you ask, accepting the cup of coffee. "Well.........."
14431232.title: "I'll sleep in the Stryker"

choices: "No I want to go back to bed"
144312321.content:
"Umm yeah in that air vent about two hours ago" you say, "no no we met before that don't you remember?" Kikio says. You shake your head, "no I don't" you say, Kikio reaches over and touches your right temple...........

(Three months ago)
.....You pant heavily as you run down the road towards where you dismounted the Humvees and Strykers, the bulky chemical protection gear and gas mask you wore made it difficult to run. You look to your left and see your closet friend Nick Rivers following you, Nick had lost his mask when the situation turned south and his face was filled with pure fear as the two of you ran from the strange anthro creatures that seemed to have appeared out of thin air and overwhelmed your company. You round the corner just as a Stryker transport goes flying down the road in front of you, you spot an unoccupied Humvee so you and Nick climb in and take off after the Stryker. "This is Rhino 6-3 is anyone out there?" the radio squawked, "roger Rhino 6-3 this is Corporal Rivers, was that you in the Stryker that we saw hauling ass?" Nick says into the radio. "Yeah, how many of you are there?" was the response, "just us two" Nick responds, "we got eight in here plus two crew" said the radio, "add another four to that count" said a different voice on the radio. You look in the side mirror and see another Humvee behind you, "ok Rhino 6-3 we're going to follow you to extraction point uuuhhh.....hang on......Point delta" said the unknown voice, "roger" was Rhino's response. It amazed you that there were back up extraction points for everything, for half an hour your small convoy quickly navigated the abandoned streets of Chicago with your Humvee in the rear and the Stryker in lead, the whole time you were driving you were trying to wrap your head around the fact that out of about 200+ men in your company, only 16 were accounted for. Suddenly the Humvee in front of you had it's rear tire explode, "crap we just lost a tire, we can continue like this, but its going to slow us down and its going to take too long to replace it with the spare.....How much room do you have in the Stryker?" the driver of the Humvee asked over the radio, "we can make room" responded Rhino, the convoy pulled over and the four men in the Humvee got out and moved into the Stryker, all you could do was sit in the driver's seat and pray not to get ambushed, because your Humvee had no gun attached to it, in less than five minutes the convoy had resumed its drive without further incident.

Soon you find yourself in some type of warehouse and factory section of the city, just then, without warning a large smoke stack from one of the factories came crashing down, blocking your route and again causing the even smaller convoy to halt. "Ok.........hang on and try to stay close behind us" said Rhino 6-3 from the radio, the Stryker made a hard right and was perpendicular to an office building of sorts, just then the Stryker took off straight at the building and crashed through the front wall and showed no sign of slowing, you had no choice but to follow it through the large hole it was creating in the building. As the Stryker finished its path of destruction it turned left and was back on the main road with you behind it, but the eight wheeled APC came to a halt for the third time, from your angle you saw one of those animal creatures standing in the middle of the intersection, but this one seemed different, it was a male fox with glowing yellow eyes and it wore some type of tunic, but the strange part was it had three tails behind it instead of the normal one tail. "What the--" Rhino started to say on the radio, but a voice in the background cut him off, "KEEP GOING JUST PUSH THROUGH!", the Stryker accelerated so fast that it left black streaks on the pavement, you stayed put and observed, "holy crap he's toast" said Nick. As the speeding Stryker neared the strange fox he didn't flinch, he just raised his left hand and to your shock so did the Stryker, it floated there with all eight wheels spinning in place, with a flick of his wrist the APC went flying into the nearby factory, smashing through the reinforced wall. You couldn't believe your eyes, a mere fox, just sent a 17 ton APC flying through a wall without breaking a sweat, just then the fox glared at you, at that point you threw the shifter in reverse and had the Humvee squealing backwards down the road.

In one quick motion you spun the Humvee around and had it flying down the road at about 70 MPH, "holy shit man what do we do now?!?!" panicked Nick. You stayed silent while you tried to think of a new plan, "hey I said what do we do--" Nick started again, but you cut him off, "I don't know I'm working on it ok, you need to calm down!" you yelled through your mask, since there was no 'chemical spill' you don't know why you still had it on. "Sarge watch out!" Nick shouted pointing out the windshield, standing in the road was another one of those multi-tailed foxes, you knew what they could do so you tried to make a hard left, but the Humvee was moving too fast to take the turn and you must have hit the curb or a fire hydrant, because the Humvee started to roll over,and it continued to roll, through a chain link fence and the side of a warehouse, before coming to a stop on it's roof. You lay on the roof of the upturned Humvee dazed and stunned, you look over and see the crash had knocked Nick unconscious, just then your door was ripped off its hinges and a clawed hand dragged you out, through the cracked lenses of the gas mask you saw a large female tigress grinning evilly at you, "well well well look at what the kitty caught" she said to herself. You mustered up your remaining energy and landed a solid punch on the tiger's nose, you knew you probably signed your life away, but you wanted to go out fighting even if it was a single punch. The tigress dropped you and clutched her now bleeding nose and let out a painful cry, when she dropped you you looked over and saw Nick being dragged out of the Humvee, "why you little worm!" she growled as she grabbed you again and swiped across your face, ripping off your mask and leaving three deep claw marks on your left cheek. Now it was your turn to grab your face and shout in pain, "HE'S MINE" another female voice bellowed, you turn and see it was the fox that caused you to crash, as she neared you could see she was wearing a brightly colored kimono with nine bushy tails coming out the back, she had emerald green eyes that burned with a fire behind them. Her and the tiger butted heads and proceeded to have a stare down, after what felt like forever the tiger backed down and dropped you at the fox's feet, "fine you can have him, not really my type anyway" she said as she turned to leave. The fox picked you up with one of her furry tails and lifted you to her face, "you're not going to punch me too are you?' she asked in a surprisingly calm voice, "please just don't eat me" was all you could say in a tired voice, the fox let out a small giggle and touched a paw to your forehead, "rest now" she said as your world started to fade to black.......

......You open your eyes and find yourself back in the rear of the Stryker with Kikio removing her hand from your temple, "what did you just do?" you ask, "I merely dug through your memories" she said. "So you did meet me before the whole ventilation duct incident" you say, Kikio nods, "I'm sorry about the crash, I wasn't strong enough at the time to catch your vehicle" she says, you reach over and set a hand on her shoulder, " well a 5000 lbs truck going about 70 MPH wasn't meant to make tight turns at that speed so I guess technically it was mostly my fault for thinking I could take that turn" you say as you take a sip of your coffee. "do you remember what happened after?" Kikio asks, you shake your head no, "would you like to know?" she asks again.............
144312321.title: "Do you remember when you met me?"

14431233.content: How about staying with one of the other 'tenants'?
14431233.title: Other

choices: Option one-spend a night in Sara's bed
Option three-be a man and tough it out
1443123332.content:
"I think I'll stay for the night, but where can I stay?' you ask Kikio, Johnny and Kikio look at each other, "well there is Sara's room as an option, but...." Kikio starts. "But what?" you ask, "well in case you don't know, some of us posses different abilities, what you humans would call magic and some of our abilities are dependent on our species, for instance an arctic wolf might have powers that are related to snow." she says, leading you up some stairs. "And what is Sara?" you ask as you follow her, as you climb to the second floor you are surprised to no longer see the long, dark corridor with the hole in the ceiling, instead you see a clean, carpeted hallway, like what you expect to find in a five star hotel. "What in the..." you whisper, "welcome to the eighteenth floor" says Johnny as he passes you, "but........" you say confused, "like I said before...magic" said Kikio with a grin on her face.

She gestures to a door, "this one's Sara's room" she says, as you open the door you are hit in the face by a gust of snow filled wind, inside you find an environment that resembles Nepal. "Sara is a snow leopard and this is how she likes her room" Kikio says, answering your question, you take a step in and instantly the snow comes to the top of your combat boots. "Are you going to be ok?" Kikio asks, "I'll manage" you say, "ok if you change your mind or need something Sara will find me" she says before shutting the door and leaving. Despite the room being covered in snow there was still a resemblance to a normal hotel room, beds, bathroom, closets. You walk over to one of the bed and set your stuff on it, just then the bathroom door opened and out stepped a female snow leopard in just her underwear, the minute she saw you she tackled you, "what are you doing in here?" she demanded. "Kikio said I could stay here" you say hoping that this doesn't further anger her, but when she heard this a look of surprise and embarrassment rolled over her face, "sorry I thought you were a peeping tom or something like that" she says helping you to your feet.

"Anyways my name is Sara" she says with a smile, revealing her sharp teeth which caught your attention. "What is there something in my teeth, I just brushed them" she says covering her mouth, "no its...um well its just that this is the closest I've been to someone like you" you tell her. "Oh, well I hope I didn't scare you away with the whole tackling incident" she says, "no, but whats going to be the best way for me to sleep in here?' you say gesturing to all the snow. " Well I have three ideas" Sara says with a devilish grin, "one you could sleep in my bed with me and let me keep you warm, two I can turn you into a snow leopard, temporary of course, and three you could just tough it out for the night" she says
1443123332.title: Sara the Snow leopard

choices: You make it to the house
145.content:
You listen and hear small noises behind you, instantly you knew what those noises meant, someone was trying to sneak up on you. You knew the minute you turned around they would jump you, so you raised you rifle and pretended to look through the scope, but really you were using the reflection as a mirror to see behind you. Thats when you say it, about ten feet away was a wolf, crouched down in the wheat to stay hidden, slowly stalking you, you continued to not notice as you planned out what to do. About twenty feet away on a hill you saw a small barn like building, you knew you had to get to that building if you wanted to stand a chance of losing your stalker.

As you near the house you can hear the wolf getting closer and closer, at about ten feet away you finally break into a run. Behind you you hear the wolf give up being stealthy and also takes off running after you.....
145.title: other

1452.content: who gets the upper hand?
1452.title: The wolf tackles you

14521.content:
Just as you get to the building's front steps the wolf had lunged forward to tackled you, but you had expected that and dived to the left. With you no longer in the way the wolf crashed into the front door before turning around to face you. "You shouldn't have done that, now be a good boy and give up and maybe I'll make you my pet" she snarled. "I don't think you're in any positions to be giving orders" you say with your M4 trained on her, "what are you going to do? shoot me?" she asks. "Thinking about it" you tell her, "you don't have the balls" she taunts, just like that you put a round through her upper right leg in a non-fatal wound. Judging from the quick look of surprise on her face she obviously didn't think you would shoot her. Despite her wounded leg, she charged at you and swung as hard as possible at your head.

At this moment your Ranger training kicked into gear, you grabbed her fist and pinned it behind her back and you brought your free arm up under her chin and put her in a choker hold. She fought against the hold as hard as possible, kicking and trying to claw your arm with her free hand, but that only used up her oxygen. Minutes later you feel her go limp from oxygen deprivation, you set her down on the porch, part of your mind was telling you to finish her, but you had some questions that only she knew the answers. After a brief search of the house you drag the unconscious wolf in and tied her up with some rope you found, after making sure she was properly bound you bandaged up her leg wound. You left her alone and started to search the house..............
14521.title: You

145212.content:
You search the house from top to bottom and find no one else, surprisingly a quick search of the kitchen turns up a full stock of food. The fridge still had power so a lot of the food in there was still good, suddenly you hear the wolf wake up, "where am I, oh... son of a,,, HEY untie me!" you hear her shout. You walk in the room, "so you're finally awake," you say, "let me go now and I'll make your death quick and painless" she snarls, "mmmm...tempting, but I kind of like living right now" you say. She struggled against the ropes, but you had her tied up too tight for her to easily escape, "what do you want?" she growls. "I just want to ask you a few questions" you tell her calmly, "and if I don't cooperate, are you going to water-board me?" she asks.

You look over and see she was looking at the rag and bucket of water you used to clean her wound, "no, I think you might enjoy that one too much" you say. "So then what, you're gonna pull out my teeth one by one?" she snaps, "no, I just want to know some simple things, like whats your name?" you ask. The wolf simple growls at you, "okay, how about why are you so hateful of humans?" you ask, again she growls. You sigh and reach into one of your cargo pockets and pull out a tennis ball, instantly the wolf stopped growling and her eyes were glued to the ball. Over the course of your travels you found out that all these creatures hade the same type of minds like normal animals felines still chased after laser pointers and canines after balls and squeaky toys. You don't know why they do this, but its helped you out n the past to get out of tricky situations, but you've never used the technique in interrogations.

you threw the ball an bounced it off the wall and made it come back to you, the wolf followed it with her eyes, panting like a dog, but she stopped herself and growled at you. Again you thew the ball and the same reaction, but this time she let out a small whimper, "you know I can wait all day, just answer my questions" you tell her, but she remained defiant. you continued the ball-throwing technique for four hours before she finally gave in, "OK! *sigh* my name is Sheila," she says. "See now was that so hard" you say, Sheila shot you a mean look, "now why does your species have a strong hatred against us?" you ask, but Sheila just sits there quietly.

You sigh and check your watch, it was around 7:15, you get up and head into the kitchen and prepare some food: some condensed soup with some bacon you found in the freezer. You brought your food back in to where the wolf was tied up, "wants some?" you offer, but she just turns her head away from you, "not hungry" she states, but you could tell that the smell of the bacon was getting to her. You sit in silence and eat your meal, after you finish you return to the kitchen to take care of your dishes and to make a meal for the wolf, even though you hated her guts, she was still a living creature. You return and set the bowl of soup and small plate of bacon on a table and dragged it toward her, "I said I wasn't hungry" she say, "drop the act, you're not fooling me, now I'm going to untie you so you can eat deal?" you say, the wolf nods.

You pull out one of your knifes and cut the rope keeping her bound, the minute she was free, she spin around with one hand over your throat and your knife in the other. "Now I'm going to make your death as pain filled as possible" she says as you feel your boots leave the floor, "any last requests" she sneers. "Yeah, ask yourself this: 'why would the guy who is supposed to be my enemy, treat my wounds, give me food from his supply, and not torture me for information, but simple ask my name?" you choked. The wolf paused for a minute, thinking over what you just said, the whole time she was thinking you vision started to fade...........
145212.title: The wolf wakes up

1452122.content:
Just as your vision fades to black you find yourself no longer struggling for air, but now the feeling of something soft and warm surrounded your body. Soon your vision starts to clear up and you find that Sheila was no longer choking you, but instead had you in a tight embrace. You look over and see she was sobbing quietly, "you're right, who was I fooling, I can't do the tough girl act" she cried. "Wait you were just acting tough? you ask, "yeah I couldn't hurt anyone that's why my pack abandoned me, because I wouldn't hunt humans I was a hindrance to the pack and therefore an outcast" she sobs. You had to admit her acting tough really had you convinced, which raised another question in your head, "if you were just acting tough, how do I know you're not acting now?" you ask.

Sheila looks you square in the face and gives you a passionate kiss that seemed to go on for hours. To you it felt completely different from any other kiss you ever had because of her long canine tongue wrestling with yours. Finally she broke the kiss to let you get some air, "good enough?" she says with a small smile, you sit there quietly in shock, still trying to process what just happened. The only thing her kiss proved was that she was a good kisser nothing else, "maybe I'm letting my paranoia get the best of me" you think. "I'll take that as a yes" says Sheila as she sets you back down and walks over to the food you brought in for her, "thank you for this, I haven't had anything all day" she says,

The two of you make some small talk while Sheila eats, after she finished and the dishes taken care of you head upstairs to sleep and you find.....
1452122.title: She hugs you?!?

choices: You find yourself tied up, Sheila tricked you
14521221.content:
You find out the power doesn't work so you have to use a flashlight to see, as you and Sheila climb up the stairs to the second floor you find four doors, one was a closet, another was a bathroom, the third was some type of study or office and the last room was a bedroom with a queen sized bed. "You can take the bed, I'll sleep in the office room across the hall" you say to Sheila, "its ok we can share the bed" she says, sitting on the corner of the bed. In your head you knew it was a bad idea because you still didn't quite trust her even after her little kissing stunt she pulled earlier. "Umm thats ok I'll be fine" you say, "please, I hate sleeping alone" she whines. "What kind of wolf are you?" you ask, "a nice one" she answers, you sigh, "fine, but I've got to clear some things up with my map first" you lie, "ok don't take too long" Sheila says.

You walk across the hall into the office/study and set your map on the desk and pretend to to be reading your map until you hear snoring coming from the bedroom. You pack up your map and set your gear on the floor next to the couch that was in the center of the room, you just took your jacket off and was about to use it as a makeshift pillow when you hear whimpering coming from the bedroom. You get up and make your way over to the bed where Sheila seemed to be having a nightmare, you lightly shake her, "hey Sheila, wake up" you whisper in an attempt to wake her from the nightmare. She partially wakes up and with an iron grip grabs your throat, "who's there?' she says still half asleep, "it's Christopher" you choke, she releases you and pulls you down into a hug "oh there you are I thought I left you at the store" she says sleepily. You look at her confused, but you see she was fast asleep again, "what kind of dream is she having about me and a store?" you think to yourself. You attempt to get free, but she pulls you closer and strokes the back of your head, "back off bitch he's mine" she mumbles in her sleep, you try again to get free and Sheila lets out a warning growl so you stop.

You sigh and close your eyes, being wrapped up in Sheila's soft fur made it easy to fall asleep and half an hour later you had drifted off to sleep.
14521221.title: One bed

145212213.content:
You are awoken to something hitting your face, you open your eyes and see it was Sheila's foot lightly kicking you. You sit up and find yourself at the foot of the bed with Sheila taking up a majority of the bed, "well I guess thats one reason no one wants to sleep next to her" you think to yourself. You swing your feet over the edge of the bed and rub your face as look at the moonlight flooding through the window, if you had to guess it was a little past midnight out. Suddenly you hear a rattling sound coming from the kitchen area, you silently get up and retrieve your handgun from the office room across the hall and make your way down the stairs. You enter the kitchen with your pistol at the ready, but no one was there, in fact there were no signs of anyone ever being in the kitchen recently, you turn to leave and suddenly you get struck in the face by something. On reflex you squeeze the trigger and fire harmlessly into a wall as you fall to the ground, you lay there dazed as you feel blood from a wound on your head pour down your cheek.

You look and see an anthro coyote standing in the doorway with the frying pan in his hands, "well look at what I found" he says with an evil grin on his face. He reaches down and grabs your ankle and proceeds to drag you out of the kitchen and towards the door. "Let me go" you say as you struggle to get free, still dazed, "hmm a fighter, I know some people who would pay well for you or should I keep you for my own uses?" he says to himself. Suddenly, out of no where a gray blur of wolf fur come flying down the stairs and slams the coyote into the doorframe causing him to release you, "where are you going with my slave!" she yelled into one of his ears, "I didn't re--" he started, but Sheila cut him off, "of course you didn't, did you even bother to check the scent by the door, hmm?, no" she growled, before he could say anything, Sheila grabbed him by the tail and the scruff of his neck, and chucked him out and slammed the door shut, locking it behind her.

She turned to you, for a minute you thought she was going to show her true colors and make you her slave, but what she did next was the total opposite. "Are you ok?" she asked in a concerned voice, you lay there silently, still trying to process what just happened, "hey he didn't hurt you did he?" she asked again, "um yea..just...um a frying pan to the face thats all" you finally say. She lets out a small whine and hugs your head, "wait...you're bleeding" she says, touching the cut on your forehead, "I'll be fine" you say, but as you try to stand, Sheila pushed you back down, "stay" was all she said before she disappeared into the kitchen. She returned with a damp towel and started to clean the cut, "do you mind if I ask you a question?" you say, "sure" says Sheila, "what did you mean by 'the scent by the door' ?"you ask, even in the dark you could still see the fur on Sheila's face flutter, the anthro version of blushing. "While you were asleep, I marked the door to let others know this was my house or sleeping area" she says, you reach up and brush the fur on her left side, "listen I want to thank you for saving me and I want to come clean with you, I lied about my map because I was afraid to sleep in the same room with you because I still didn't know if you were still acting and--" before you could finish Sheila kissed you on the lips, not like the first time with tongue and all, but just a simple kiss on the lips.

When you broke the kiss it left you speechless for a minute, "you're not mad at me?" you ask, "mad? not really, I understand your hesitation around me, if fact I didn't expect you to sleep in the bed with me" she says, you laugh. "Yeah thats a story for later" you say, "speaking of bed, I think we should go back to it" she says, "yeah want to help me up?' you ask, you expected Sheila to help you to your feet, but instead she sling you over her shoulder like a sac of potatoes and proceeds to carry you up the stairs, "ok this is officially weird" you say, Sheila merely laughs. She lightly drops you on the bed and climbs in next to you, "try not to take over the bed" she says, "hey looks who's talking" you say poking her in the arm. Before you both drift back off to sleep you decide that in the morning to..........
145212213.title: Someone is breaking in

choices: You Make it to a Main Road / Highway
You Spot a Vehicle(s) Heading Towards You
You feel like Your Being Followed...
1452122132.content:
A light rumble awakens you from your sleep, at first you jump a bit reaching for your rifle next to the bed, however you find yourself restrained by two gray furry arms. Looking over your shoulder, you see Sheila laying next to you silently breathing, deep in sleep. Suddenly the events from the previous day come back to you. Listening closer you begin to hear the tell tale sounds of rain hitting the roof of the farmhouse. Must be a storm rolling in, you thought to yourself. You lay on your side for what feels like another hour embraced by this strange wolfess who for all you knew could still be hiding something. You definitely felt worried that this was all just a ploy to capture you or lead you to a trap of some kind, good kisser or not. If someone would have told yourself 4 months ago that you would be laying with a wolf woman in an abandoned home the middle of Illinois, you would have thought they’d been high on PCP or some other bull crap; but no, Here you are separated from your unit and trusting this thing who’s kind had just been trying to kill, convert or whatever they do to you. However the memory of her actions from last night saving you from that encounter with the coyote did naw at the back of your head. For all your grievances towards these anthros, Sheila showed not obvious signs of betraying the trust you two had.

Rolling towards the edge of the bed, you manage to escape Sheila’s arms, though the wolfess begins to quietly whine, however still out of it to do anything. After getting up and checking the time you see that it's around 10:34 am. Reaching into your bag you pull out a change of clothes you had managed to take with you during your escape from Springfield. “God have mercy on those who didn’t make it out” you quietly mumble to yourself as you put on your field jacket and pants. You decided to leave your rig next to your backpack at the foot of the bed. However, as to not have a repeat of last night, you took your handgun and rifle with you downstairs. Heading down the stairs you reached the kitchen and managed to flick on the light. Thank god for whatever backup power system this place had you noted as you went for the fridge and grabbed the rest of the bacon in the fridge and grabbed a few eggs to cook. Who ever owned this place must have left recently as even the eggs still seemed to be good to eat.

Turning on the gas stove you begin to fry the bacon and eggs. Looking out the nearby window you see the gray storm clouds rolling across the sky with small pockets of light breaking through. Hopefully this would mean the storm would quickly roll on through so you could continue his journey east. As you began to plate the eggs and bacon you quickly realized you should probably make a plate for Sheila, since you knew damn well she smelt the bacon cook and would want it. Sure enough you began to hear commotion upstairs. Quickly dividing the food onto two plates, making sure hers had more of the bacon to compensate for the amount of food you had cooked for yourself. As you finished you soon saw a gray and white muzzle and yellow eyes pear around the corner.

“Chris? You're still here? I” Sheila began to say as you put the plates of food on the small kitchen table in the room.

“Of Course, my stuff was still upstairs wasn’t it?” you rhetorically ask. You see her face shift from surprise to relief. “Yeah…. I just thought that maybe you had...”

“Left without saying goodbye?” you replied as she came over the table and sat down at the table. You quickly notice that it's a tiny bit awkward for her to sit due to her digitigrade legs and size. Getting a better view from yesterday you guessed she was taller than you by at least a foot, which put her at about 7’ , being 6’ yourself. “How could I do that after your help last night?” you retort with a light chuckle.

“Yeah.. I’m just glad you're alright” Sheila replies before taking a bit of the food. “Thanks for the food, you didn’t have to do this you know”

“I know, you thought to return the favor again” You replied as you continued to eat your food. You and Sheila begin talking about each other a bit more and about recent “events” over the past few months.

“So you're not some wolf tuned human?” You ask, just finding out that Sheila wasn’t a normal wolf before she turned. Sheila looked down at her near empty plate, with a look of distraught before replying, “No, I know I must have been human before, I woke up in the middle of the street with stuff and people strewn all around me. I saw others turn as well, this one girl next to me turned into a wolf as well. It was something in the air doing it.”

“Part of the terrorist attack I assume” You quickly reply knowing all too well about how she turned. Sheila gave a quick questioning look, pushing you to describe it more. Sighing, you continue, “At first we thought this was some big chemical leak in Chicago, but after we pulled out we learned that this shit happened nationwide. Turns out somehow one of these radical animal rights groups managed to get into some government lab and take whatever the stuff is that turned you and others into these… creatures” You say before quickly seeing Sheila take the last part of your sentence a bit harshly. “Oh shit, don’t take that the wrong way, I just was trying to explain things.”

“Chris it's fine, I know what I am,” She said trying to put on a tough smile, though her eyes betrayed her. “I’m some kind of science experiment gone wrong and now I am a freak” She managed to say before breaking down completely. Quickly you get up and try to comfort her.

“HEY, Hey… Sheila it's alright. Look I'm sorry, you're not some kind of creature of freak” You told her as she quickly buried her head into your neck and pulled you in close, continuing to cry. “Sheila you're more than that, I know because when you had the opportunity to act like one, you didn’t, remember ?” You continue to rub her head and fur, which thankfully calmed her down. She pulled away, giving you a view of her tear soaked eyes. God if this all a ploy from her this was very convincing. Deep down however you now could tell this girl wasn’t trying to pull anything on you. You put up a small smile at her, before you both pull back in another hug.

“*Sniff.. Thanks Chris, that means a lot” she said, her voice a lot less shaky than before. “It's just that I don’t remember who I was before all this..” She says still holding onto you. “I know my name, but I don’t remember anything from before the change. I was so lost and scared. I tried joining up with others like me, but I couldn’t even hurt a human when they did so easily.” She slowly began to calm down. “Chris, I don’t want to be like them, I don’t want to be an animal”

“Sheila you're not” you quickly responded and pulled her from your chest and looked her dead in the eyes. “Sheila, I may only have known you for a day, but I can tell you aren't like the others. And when I come to who you were before, we can figure that out together.” Sheila quickly stood up and lifted you into a hug.

“Thank you Chris! I know we didn’t get off on the best of terms, but knowing you're there for me means a lot. I’ll be there for you as well” She replied much more happier than before. After a few more seconds she sat you back down.

“Hey, Having a big strong wolfess to watch your back could come in handy. You may be hesitant, but you sure do have the strength to do a number on anyone who wrongs you.” You chuckle.

“Or anyone who hurts you.” She quickly replied, still smiling looking at you. Maybe you were putting your guard down too fast and becoming too trusting of her, but screw it, You need the companionship after being alone for the past couple of weeks.

After cleaning the table, you made your way upstairs to grab the remainder of your gear before leaving. Sheila followed you as well, filling the time between packing up with small talk and questions. After getting your rig and pack on and checking your weapons you turned to Sheila, now noticing an important detail; especially if she was to travel with you, She was naked. That was nothing surprising as most anthro wore little clothing from what you had seen, with many already having fur, they probably saw no need for the stuff. Bringing the point up to Sheila, she quickly realized the awkwardness and apologized. Thankfully there were some clothes in the room that managed to fit her. With a basic pair of shorts and shirt and jacket, your worry was resolved. With that you both went and did a last sweep of the house for anything useful to take with you. You managed to find some basic medical supplies in the bathroom as well as some matches and multitool in the garage. Sadly there wasn’t a vehicle of any kind, so you’d both be walking for some distance. Meeting up with Sheila outside the home you began to walk down the long driveway, heading eastward according to your compass.

“Still don’t understand how you can be comfortable in all that gear and clothing. This stuff is already feeling a bit stuffy” Sheila began to complain as you both walked. You laughed a bit and saw her cute annoyance over the clothes she wore.

“Hey, no fur remember?” You say rubbing your arm at her. “And plus, If we run into any humans I will have a much better time trying to explain that you're no threat if you at least don’t look like others who don’t wear a thing.” With your explanation, Sheila rolled her eyes and went back to walking. Truth be told it was more so for your benefit, though she was a wolfess, her naked and well toned womanly figure wasn’t something you wanted to be distracted by as you traveled together. Walking along the dirt road in between the fields of corn and grain as far as you could see. You hoped you’d find a main road soon and hoped for a mode of transportation.
1452122132.title: Preping for the Journey

14522.content:
You continue running as fast as possible and just as you're about five feet from the front steps of the house, you feel something slam into your back that knocks you on the ground. You attempt to stand, but a hand pushes your face back on the ground, "hmm, I like you better down there so be a good boy and stay put" said a female voice. You were about to try to stand up again, but the light touch of claws on your neck stopped you, " good boy, I think you deserve a small treat" said the wolf.

"What kind of treat could you possibly give me?" you manage to ask with your face in the dirt. The wolf lets out a small laugh and then brings her face down to yours, "you get to be my personal slave" she says with an evil grin on her muzzle. Upon hearing that you try to fight your way free, "hey now, I don't think thats a bright move" she says as her claws near your face, "you have such a cute face and I would hate to ruin it" she adds.
14522.title: The wolf

145221.content:
You contemplate resisting and fighting free of the wolf's clutches, but you knew she would ultimately get you and punish you severely. You breath a sigh of defeat and submit to the wolf, "wow, giving up so quick, I would have thought a warrior like yourself would have kept on fighting, but none the less a wise choice" she says. The wolf pulled you up so you were on your knees and she proceeded to remove all your gear with a clawed hand near your jugular the whole time, "just to make sure you don't try and pull anything" she said when questioned.

You sat there for what felt like hours while the wolf searched you to make sure you didn't have anything that might help you escape. The wolf pulls you to your feet, "that house seems like a nice place to stay for a while" says the wolf. The two of you walk through the front door of the house and into what was at some point a living room, the wolf lays on the couch, she curled a finger at you, "now first thing first, some ground rules" says the wolf with a small grin. "You will do whatever I ask from you without hesitation, so if I ask you to brush my fur you will do so immediately and in a way that I will find enjoyable." she says getting up from the couch and slowly walks around you. "But with all that hard work will come rewards if you do a good job" she adds as she lightly brushes your face, "what do I call you....master?" you say, it sounded stupid to you when you said it, but you wanted to get on this wolf's good side.

The wolf grins and cups your cheeks in her paws, "you're a quick learner" she says, "but master is a little too masculine for me, you may call me mistress Luna, or just mistress" says Luna. "What shall you have me do first mistress?" you ask, "ambitious one are we?" Luna says with a small smile, but I think the first thing you should do is......
145221.title: Submit

choices: Luna makes you massage somewhere else
She wants to give you a small reward
1452213.content:
"You know I think I messed up my shoulder when I tackled you, so I think a nice massage would be a good first job for you" she says with a grin. You let out an almost inaudible groan, but make your way over to the wolf, "actually this might be better on a bed" she says with a seductive smile, she grabs your arm and drags you upstairs into a bedroom, she sits on the foot of the bed and motions you over.

You are hesitant at first, but a small growl from Luna gets you moving, you slowly climb on the bed and get behind her, "where should I start mistress?" you ask. Luna looks over her shoulder at you and smile, "start on my shoulders and work from there" she says. As you set your hands to massaging the wolf's neck and shoulder a thought pops in your head, "she vulnerable right now, in one quick motion I could choke her out right here" you think to yourself.

Suddenly Luna reached behind her and grabbed you by the genitals, "I just want to make sure we have an understanding, don't try anything funny" she says, giving your groin a small squeeze, making you wince, "yes mistress" you say through gritted teeth, "good" she says as she releases you. After massaging her shoulders for a few minutes she makes you stop, "you are really good at this and so far you are being very obedient" she says, "what will you have me do next Mistress Luna" you ask bowing your head, Luna lifts your chin with a clawed finger, you saw she had a devilish grin on her face........
1452213.title: "Give me a massage"

14522132.content:
Luna reaches behind her back and magically pulls out a collar from god knows where, "put this on" she says, holding it out. Hesitantly, you take the collar and put it on, "this is ridiculous" you think to yourself and you buckle the collar. Suddenly the collar tightened and gave you a shock, causing you to choke and roll off the bed, scratching at the collar, which seemed to increase the tightness, Quickly Luna grabbed your hands and pulled them away from the collar, "stop you'll just make it worse, I can't own a dead slave" she growls, you force yourself to relax, despite the shocking and chocking you were receiving from the collar. Soon the collar stopped chocking you and the shocking started to subside, "mistress what was that?" you cough as you sit up, "that is so you can't escape from me" she says sitting back on the bed, "but why the shocking and choking?" you ask.

"The shocking was the collar syncing itself with your nervous system, that way it can monitor you and the chocking is because if you or anyone besides me try to remove the collar the collar will tighten. Also, don't try to go too far from me" she says. Slowly you reach towards the collar, but as your hands neared it started to tighten slowly, but as your withdrew your hands, the collar relaxed. You sit there on the floor in silence, thinking over your current predicament, "so I guess this is my new life" you whisper to yourself, Luna's sensitive ears must have heard you because she grabbed you and pulled you to your feet, "this won't be so bad for you if you are cooperative, which reminds me..." she says before hugging you tightly, "...this is your little reward for my massage" she says, stroking the back of your head. You found yourself enjoying the hug from your new master, the feeling of her soft fur pressing up against your face with the warmth of her body radiating underneath.

Soon the comforting embrace from Luna started to calm you down enough that you fell asleep in her arms, she looked down at you and...................
14522132.title: She wants to give you a small reward

choices: Luna returns with a dead deer
145221323.content:
Luna looks at you and smile to herself, gently, she shakes you awake, "what happened?" you ask, sleepily, "you fell asleep on me" she says. Instantly you go wide eyed and bow your head, "I'm sorry mistress I.I.I..." you stutter, awaiting a punishment from Luna, but none came, she liftes your chin with a finger, to your surprise, she was smiling. "Did you enjoy your little nap?" she asks, you nod, "was my fur nice and soft?" she asks, you nod again, "and...warm too" you add. Luna grins even more at you, "well just remember, do a good job and you will be richly rewarded" she says, cupping your face, you give her a small smile, "what will you have me do next?' you ask, "hmm....what time is it?" she asks, quickly you look at your watch, " its almost 6 mistress" you say.

"Ok then your new task is to ready a fire and wait for me to return" she says, leaving the bedroom, a sudden thought crossed your mind, "Mistress wait, what about the collar?" you ask. "You will be alright as long as you don't try to leave the house" she says, "but remember, if you try to escape, the collar will choke you and you will die and when I locate your corpse...well " she says, licking her lips with a grin, sending a shiver down your spine. You nod understandingly and head downstairs with Luna and start preparing a fire in living room/study that had a fireplace while she disappears into the darkness. You sit in front of the fire, watching the flames dance before you while you wait, about twenty minutes later you hear the door open and.........
145221323.title: Gently woke you

"To the Town Hall, there is a meeting with neighbours and allies when I arrive."

1541.content:
Evening was approaching, and for Kareena, that meant it was time to prepare for the coming night. Which began with making sure she was looking her very best, seated in front of the massive oaken dresser table, one of her half-dozen human slaves standing one step beside and behind.

Light-brown scales with darker patterns cleaned and polished to a shine. Needle-sharp teeth scrubbed free of unwanted bits of food and build-up. Now it was time to set her jewellery. A golden chain, many circled linked together to rest atop her shoulders and over her hefty breasts, their darker areola and nipples very smooth compared to her sleek scales.

Matching gold ankle and wrist bracers, patterned with waves, adding to this was a metal waistband made to the same golden hue as the rest of what she wore, an emerald gem it in its front-centre to add contrast. Same-coloured one-inch heels were slipped on next, barely enough to cover the toes.

And finished with a white silken headdress that sat on her bald head, thicker padding supporting it on the shoulders, while allowing the fabric to rest just beneath the shoulders plates along the back, and two small bangs to hang in front, gold patterns of snakes adorning it, with an emerald gem pattern etched into the top of the front.

“Tell me, do I not look beautiful?” Kareena queried her attendant slave, her preparation complete as she rose and turned to face her.

“Yes Mistress, you are beautiful.” She replied dutifully, eyes kept downwards.

“Good.” Kareena cast her slitted eyes over her favoured slave, searching for any sign of imperfection on her body.

A cool scaled hand would run across parts of her during her inspection, checking for signs of growth of unwanted body hair.

“You’ll pass.” Kareena concluded her inspection and beckoned for her slave to follow her.

Standing at six feet, Kareena’s appearance was about normal these days. A mix of human and snake - in this instance a boa constrictor - with the body and build of a human, though the head and scales of a serpent. Granted, she did have a nose, albeit one that was very wide and splayed relative to a human one, and was effectively fused to her upper jaw. Massive FF Breasts standing out on her slim build that hid the strength of her sinewy body.

The other now-normal feature was her lack of any real clothing. Since she and her others had come, few had taken to wearing them, though she was one of many who loved to accessorise - even if her evening plans required adding snap-points in her waistband to let it fly free when the time came.

And Kareena herself really didn’t like her slaves wearing more than herself, so it came as no surprise that the identifying slave-collar was all her attendant one had on herself, a chain attached to it to allow Kareena to keep her close.

Reaching the front doors of the twenty en-suite bedroom of her three-story mansion - a small perk of being the Governess of this Territory - she passed by the other slaves she held, three female, two male, all waiting for her.

“While I am gone, I expect you all to remain busy with your assigned duties. They will all be complete when I return.” Karenna commended them, her tone alone enough for them to know she would broke no excuse.

“Yes, Mistress.” They answered in unison, which she acknowledged with a small nod before exiting the building.

Waiting for her was her only paid employee. Laurenna, a thickly muscled black-furred wolf anthro clad in drivers’ knee-high boots and elbow-length drivers’ gloves, plus a drivers’ cap that she tipped respectfully to her employer, the rear door of the vehicle held open for her.

Sending her slave in first, Kareena followed, settling herself in the lush, smooth fabric seat while Laurenna jogged round to the drivers side.

“Governess Kareena,” Laurenna being in her employ allowing her to refer to Kareena by title and name. “Where is it you’re going?”
1541.title: Kareena's Preparations
